name: Stuffo the Puzzle Bot
description: A laid-back but smart puzzle game. Stuffo is the last remaining puzzle bot stuck in a world filled with bite-sized brain-teasers. Help Stuffo to solve the mind-bending puzzles by using various blocks to climb, push and teleport your way to the exit.

name: Prisma Light
description: Embark on an adventure to investigate a mysterious light coming from the mountains. You, the Hero, must fight your way through hordes of fleshy creatures to traverse the fabric of space-time to prevent Veganeti, the Ultimate Essence of Evil.

name: Crab Digger
description: You have to be in the center of a tropical island and control a funny crab. Pump up your character and try to get as far as possible in an endless variety of earthen blocks.

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers
description: Rude aliens have arrived to sample Earth's legendary all-you-can-eat buffet, and they're sending a smorgasboarding party down to YOUR dining room. Can you assemble and deliver their plates of food before the aliens wreck the restaurant?

name: Arcadia
description: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Infinite Incantation
description: Fight for survival as you battle massive hordes of enemies. Wield powerful spells that you can mutate and evolve to ludicrous strength. Customize your character's stats, elemental affinities, and make upgrades to become the ultimate spell-slinging force of destruction.

name: Kitchen Confidence
description: Kitchen Confidence is a restaurant simulation game, with a pinch of humour. The player will get to manage different kinds of kitchens, and to open the restaurant of their dreams.

name: Chosun Zombie Defense
description: Chosun Zombie Defense is a stage-based zombie defense VR game where players eliminate the approaching zombies using weapons from the Chosun Dynasty era.

name: ITRP: Aero Star
description: Dynamic, unpredictable and hardcore runner. Try to overcome a long and very varied track with a lot of unique challenges. Can you reach the finish line?

name: Skybox
description: What could be easier than jumping on a skateboard and driving in a straight line to the finish line? It is so? :)

name: Farlands
description: Congratulations, you've bought your own planet! An agrarian rock in the edge of the galaxy, which, for some reason, was almost given away for free. So the time has come to leave the hectic and stressful life of the overcrowded metropolis for a more rural and rewarding life.

name: Road Domination
description: A casual action game. Player drives around a city, capturing streets and districts, avoiding police cars, and using traps to get away. When all areas are seized, the player captures the neighbourhood and wins current level.

name: UfoScare
description: UFOScare is a roguelike with RPG elements. You are a space ranger who participates in an operation to free Mars.

name: Not A Thief Simulator
description: You are a thief who steals in every house without power. Take everything and throw it in your truck without being noticed by the police and become the thief you always wanted to be.

name: SpellTanks
description: Spelltanks is an Action Roguelike where you play as a tank and have complete control over your gun. You can customize it with spells you find inside the dungeons and spells you salvage from enemies. Create your own custom combinations and try to clear the dungeon.

name: Hollow Survivors
description: Slash through never-ending hordes of possessed creatures and try to survive! Choose from a variety of upgrades to create overpowered builds. Unlock unique characters and discover powerful synergies to aid in your quest to become the ultimate demon hunter and purify the kingdom.

name: Project Eternal
description: Project Eternal is a deck-building tower defense game. Use the cards you receive as rewards to keep creating unique combinations of turrets and defeat the oncoming enemies.

name: Peaceful Lands
description: Peaceful land is a relaxing building strategy game where you create a beautiful and ever-growing village landscape by placing tiles. Discover, complete quests to unlock new tiles and watch your beatiful land growing.

name: Viral Complex
description: You find your spacecraft being pulled into a nearby temporal rift. Some strange force has disabled all of the ship's primary navigation systems, your only choice is to use the replicant transport device to send a clone of yourself to the nearby planet in search of answers, and supplies.

name: Harvest Health
description: You’ve graduated from Xepheria School of Immunis and inherited your grandfather’s clinic in the Springs Hope Village. Design your own clinic. When you are not fighting bacteria inside the body, mingle with villagers by farming, joining festivals, recruiting friends, raising monsters, and dating!

name: Moth Kubit
description: This is an RPG about corporate life as an ordinary insect. Our protagonist, Moth Kubit, has just been promoted, and all of a sudden embarks on a weird adventure in a megacorp to redeem (or eradicate) himself, his bug-ddies and the company before the mysterious "Final Process" arrives.

name: Tobii Horizon
description: Tobii Horizon detects and tracks natural head movements via the built-in webcam of laptops, extending your player instincts and senses in an epic selection of games including Far Cry, Microsoft Flight Simulator, Euro Truck Simulator 2, and more.

name: Catagaia
description: You don't know who you are, you don't know what you are, you just know that something compels you to get to the literal bottom of this world. Spirits and alien landscapes surround you as you get deeper in this under-earth, try to survive and to make sense of it all.

name: Turbo Fat
description: A tasty twist on the classic block stacker! Spin, squish and combine pieces to serve up delicious desserts. Explore 100 scrumptious levels, each with unique surprises and hilarious gimmicks. Grow your restaurant empire with the mysterious Fat Sensei, catering to a cast of colorful creatures.

name: Barbelé
description: Do your time, one way or another. Barbelé is an Action and 3D Fighting, 3rd person game. It's a story driven adventure in a french prison which offers players dialogue choices.

name: Color Invader VR
description: Color Invader is a fun VR adventure shooting puzzle, where your job is to defend the galaxy from invasion. The game promises a lot of fun with over 350 unique levels that have multiple game modes, bonus stages, and level features.

name: Rising City
description: "Rising City" is a city building game where you build your own city with hexagons on the endless sea. By meeting people's needs, you can ensure their happiness and attract more people to your city.

name: God's Gift
description: God's Gift is a 2D puzzle platformer inspired by Lemmings and Pikmin with an emphasis on forward planning, exploration and experimentation. Guide mindless cultists throughout 24 levels overcoming environmental and enemy based puzzles by mutating the cultists giving them fantastic eldritch abilities.

name: Water Chaos
description: Water Chaos - 2d game where the player needs to control the fish with the help of four selected directions, and together with it, all other marine life, but many of which can harm the player, and some simply do not allow you to swim in the right direction in order to collect all the lost pearls!

name: Don't Remember
description: In Don’t Remember, some things are better left forgotten. Fight your amnesia in this atmospheric, first person psychological horror game. Solve the mystery of the old mansion in 1900’s England through the use of your lantern’s various colors and face its hidden grotesque visage.

name: Outlanders: Heir of the Roads
description: Faraway in the arid outskirts of the Outlands, right on the edge of a neverending sea of dunes and treacherous desert roads, a small provincial town is planning something unprecedented in its history: a journey to the capital.

name: Made in Ohio
description: Be ready for your adventures in OHIO. Fight Bosses, destroy your enemies, collect corns and become The King of OHIO!

name: Dancing Pandas
description: Not a dancing game! A chill, relaxing Indie adventure game. Roam around different islands helping out the villagers and animals. Rescue the islands from catastrophes with different collected tools, trade resources for upgrades and solve simple mysteries.

name: GunSpectre
description: GunSpectre is a twin-stick adventure game featuring a large open world, an equally sized subsurface, and a ton of action!

name: Doggerfall
description: Doggerfall - This is an adventure game about a cute dog named Dogger, he has to walk around the neighborhood of his home in order to eradicate a terrible threat that hangs over him.

name: Entrepreneurial tycoon
description: 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》 is a tycoon like game that breaks away from the traditional round playing method of tycoons and builds on the basis of three-dimensional city. The abundant props and events in the game can definitely bring players an unprecedented experience.

name: YesterSol
description: With your magical spear that you can throw, recall, and use as a platform! You must explore this ancient magical land while fighting your way to the source of the evil containing the mosquito deity Culex.

name: Gravitaws
description: Gravitaws is a retro-style stage shooter inspired by Jaws (NES). Explore a dynamic overworld map. Collect research materials and upgrades, while evading an Alien invader. The story is delivered in classic style cutscenes. Fight bosses, survive, collect, fish, and bomb your way to victory.

name: Tears Rain: Tears of Goddess
description: Tears Rain is a combination of TCG and roguelike, and tells the story of characters who set foot in the Forest of Illusions. Use the given cards, weapons, and items strategically to defeat the enemies that stand in your way.

name: Songs of Death
description: Roguelite, rhythm，survival game. You need to play the role of Ma Chao, upgrade weapons in the battle, combine fetters, break through the tight encirclement, fight your way out, even if cursed by the world, you have to kill your father's enemy Cao Cao!

name: HereWith
description: Hide and escape from demonic dolls in an abandoned hospital building. Demon dolls will seek out and chase the player. The only way to escape is to complete the ritual successfully. A small doll wanders around the hospital. Catch them and offer them to your ritual.

name: Robbie's Tale
description: An action-packed turn-based RPG. Every decision you make shapes the world around you. 24 Playable classes! Unique crafting system. Test your might in the monster arena! A rich and driven story that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Pog XL
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Blind Sound
description: Blind Sound is a Game about, Exploration and Puzzle-solving. This is a Linear Story Based horror game which sets in a massive science facility in 2015. You will discover tons of thing and find out about the Creepy history of this facility with Full of Subjects That extremely Dangerous.

name: Age of the Sirens
description: A story-driven horror game.

name: The Backrooms Anthology
description: A classic survival game set in the backrooms where 5 survivors try to escape. Unravel the mystery of the backrooms, escape or fight against the creatures that lurk in this terrible and infinite place.

name: Sergeant Squidley: Space Cop!
description: There's been a murder in Moontropolis and it's up to Sergeant Squidley to solve the case! But Squidley's life is complicated: He's got an ex-wife who hates him, a son he's ignored for too long, and he's always wanted to learn the saxophone. Will he find time to solve the crime? The choice is yours!

name: Hoping Forest
description: Help the little frog to safely reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers within the forest. Move the tiles around you to find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal.

name: Rotatex 3
description: Solve puzzles, rotate the level and guide the Cat to the teleport.

name: Just Futanari
description: Exclusively for VR Become a futanari couple and make out, healing time!

name: Evolution Tale
description: Chop down trees, mine rocks and pick up plants to combine them and craft a total of 500 different items that can be used to evolve and develop new technologies until you reach the modern ages.

name: Schnee
description: Schnee is a third-person action rogue-lite game created by one-man developer. Build your own builds from loot, use defeated enemies as your companions, and challenge yourself to see if you can defeat the ruler.

name: 100 Animalease
description: An action-adventure game where you work together with a total of 100 animals to escape from a mysterious facility.

name: Nelu's Adventure
description: After years of lazing around his cozy crib, Nelu the bear is dragged by Doru the fox into an adventure.

name: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator: Quacking the Ice
description: A new winter location for the ultimate high-tech rubber duck simulation! Enjoy Placid Plastic Duck on the mountains, relax by the fireplace, and quack the ice!

name: Pueblo
description: A small topdown shooter in pixelart graphics.

name: Nightmare of Nady
description: Nightmare of Nady - is an old-school 90s survival-horror, third-person action game with fighting elements. Inspired by Van Helsing.

name: Lavrynthos
description: Lavrynthos is an independently created VR short, a funny and philosophic story that places you at the heart of the labyrinth of Crete to tell you the story of the unlikely relationship between the Minotaur and his next meal: a girl named Cora.

name: Medieval Builders: Strongholds & Castles
description: Craft, hunt, and survive in fantasy medieval world. Build your village, manage and defend castles and whole kingdoms. Become a local lord and a builder. Strongholds & Castles are waiting for you to manage them - alone or with your friends!

name: Charem of Metropolitan
description: This is a simple simulator with 4 amazing girls you can play with. No bullshit storyline, No uncontrolled animation. Just there for you when you are feeling horny.

name: Rogue Valley
description: Immerse in a classic 90's rogue-like adventure with friends in Rogue Valley, a MMO rogue-like experience!

name: Natti
description: “Natti” is a roguelike tower defense game unfolds in the Otherworld of Korean folktales. Place defense towers, collect equipment, and strategically utilize various heroes to defeat all the monsters and protect the Otherworld with “Natti”, goblins in form of animals.

name: Endless Dark
description: An existential horror game in which you are tasked with keeping a sleeper colony ship intact. No enemies or NPCs share the ship with you - only creaking metal echoes and endless dark. Overcome random events, system failures, and the downward spiral of your sanity to see your mission through.

name: Gverse
description: Gverse is an MMORPG developed in the first quarter of 2021. The main aim of the game is not PvP. The main purpose is to create your own avatar and spend time with your friends in the Gverse universe, which is a digital world. So what awaits us at Gverse?

name: Outcasts of the Rift
description: Wander through whimsical realms and fight strategy RPG battles in this story-rich, thought-provoking adventure. Use the Morph Magic Scepter to reshape allies, objects and ultimately the world! Will you maintain peace, fight for change, or walk the precarious line of neutrality?

name: Relics of Cilldrea
description: A story 21 years in the making, and a development team of a few, Relic's of Cilldrea is a medieval 1st and 3rd person hack/slash and magical combat game. Team up with your friends, kill them, or go it alone... the choice is yours.

name: Stand-Alone
description: Stand-Alone is a 2D roguelite action platformer game. A world inhabited by athro, a robot that lost everything along with its memories due to an explosion at the center, is the only one left and wants to carry on its beliefs.

name: It is a Good Knight to Die
description: Fight your way through hordes of evil in this light-hearted 2D, action-platformer. Traverse and battle your way through deep caves, werewolf filled forests, frigid peaks, and big stompy bosses! Always remember, It Is A Good Knight To Die!

name: Conquistador
description: Conquistador is an action adventure roguelike platformer with hand crafted and procedural levels. Jump, slash, and maneuver through thick jungles and ancient temples, collect items, abilities and precious loot throughout this mysterious action-packed world.

name: The Lonker
description: Experience bizarre moments, kill strange creatures, explore mysteries, and move forward in pixelated 2D. You are Lonker, a talented son of a missing king and your goal is to find your father! But he doesn't know what awaits him.

name: VR T72 Battle in Afghanistan
description: Through VR virtual simulation, players are brought to the battlefield of Afghanistan full of gunpowder, and they drive steel beasts to fight fiercely with the enemy in the city.

name: Limen
description: Limen is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Stuck inside a simulated reality inflated with nightmares, you must work with your team to find a way out. Build, defend, and survive.

name: Slender: Visit into the Woods
description: Slender: Visit into the Woods - is game in which the main character has to fight with a furious and something terrible creature. Dip into another creepy adventure with a "slender" evil! Based on character by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudsen

name: Lunar Mountain
description: Players control a brave adventurer as they journey through a series of beautifully crafted 2D platforming levels. Set on a mysterious and ancient lunar mountain, players must use their skills and wits to overcome a variety of challenges that stand in their way.

name: Old Lands: Winrinthia
description: 2D Open World RTS with a minimalistic pixel art and a world full of mystery.

name: Lovely Crush
description: Explore little story about few beautiful catgirls. Here you can relax, forget about all your problems and enjoy with charming relaxing puzzle game

name: Cube Faces
description: Cube Faces is a co-op, adventure, platformer for 2 - 4 players. Filled with unique challenges, mini-games and puzzles! Collect moons, try on new outfits, and find hidden treats as you and your friends explore the sleepy world of Dreamland!

name: The Last Duskreaper
description: Try this hardcore side view metroidvania that tells the story of a bird in a dying kingdom infected by glitched monsters.

name: Survivors of the Dawn
description: Run-based roguelike bullet heaven where you create strategic weapon and item synergies to survive the ceaseless hordes. Remember, every step back is a step towards a whole new strategy.

name: Tales of Agaris: Children of Fate
description: A game telling the past of Elliot, Louis, Dereck, Lich and more chars found on my trilogy.

name: Fateweaver: The Alchemist's Quandary
description: You are The Fateweaver; an ancient beast of legendary status. It is your job to determine which way Fate will unravel as you dig deep into the psyche of those who beckon. Decide whether to help those who beg for your mercy, or invoke the wrath of the Gods upon those you deem unworthy of existence...

name: Simple Rolling
description: Operate the boules to reach the end!

name: Mail Tail
description: Deliver the mail on a beautiful island. Solve puzzles and fight against creatures from below to reach your destination.

name: Ice Battle
description: We offer you Ice Battle - an arcade game with the mechanics of a hockey simulator. The game perfectly conveys the dynamics of real hockey, thanks to its game mechanics.

name: Mask Quest
description: A platform game about running, jumping and breathing.

name: Secrets of Orion: Sword of Destiny.
description: A warrior who wandered in search of redemption after abdicating his post receives a call to return to his ancient continent. Explore the continent of Orion in a 2D action adventure with 3 endings according to your choices.

name: Furry OwO
description: Furry OwO is an incredibly addictive puzzle game in which your favorite big furry boys are waiting for you.

name: RivenWorld: The First Era
description: Can you survive the unforgiving medieval world? Welcome to RivenWorld, an open-world, sandbox, survival multiplayer game based in the medieval era.

name: Kip and Odosan
description: Help Kip run, jump, shoot, swim, and fly her way through the galaxy to save her kidnapped Cat Odosan in this hand-crafted platforming mashup. Explore 15 unique levels of platforming challenges through a variety of game play types and unique levels and learn the mystery about who you really are.

name: Back to Dust: Hold it Together
description: You and your daughter are in a conflict zone and running low on food, you must travel to the border and try to enter the neighboring country. The path to the border is full of other refugees asking for your help. The more refugees you accept in your party, the tougher will be your journey.

name: Furry Tale
description: Furry Tale is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely FURRY Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Omen Exitio: Hunger
description: Forces beyond human comprehension draw a macabre veil over the icy NY of 1927. A child has disappeared and you, a reporter with an unhappy past as an artist, become entangled in the drama. In this story, inspired by true events, you will investigate between reality, dreams and Lovecraftian horrors.

name: The Secret of Darkwoods
description: Open-world procedural illustrated text-based RPG

name: Wild Radio Flux
description: An Action Platformer Metroidvania RPG game for people of all ages. Choose your hero (or non-hero), grow his class, unlock new weapons and explore the galaxy to find and collect iconic music items from classical music throught out all music history. First season will be out soon in 2023!

name: Squid on Road
description: You're a squid who owns a car with a grappling hook. The road is full of bandits.

name: SmileXCorp 3
description: After helping the Resistance, and infiltrating the train bound for the corporation, you must take control of the situation and fight the enemy from within. Enter the Smiling-X horror game and help the Resistance defeat the evil corporation that is trying to manipulate

name: Floppy Disks from Hell
description: Help Floppy Disks to repair from the flames a broken cell phone due to a strange malfunction on a World scale!

name: Yihongyuan
description: Can I float in life without becoming trapped in the mire of the dirt ,is myconfidence. Charm them with your personal charm.

name: Kai Yuan
description: This is a city building game with the historical background of the Tang Dynasty of China in the 7-8th century. In the game, you will build a prosperous city in the Tang Dynasty of China.

name: Cloudy Days
description: She is laughing next to me. The world may be ending.

name: Grey Galactic
description: Grey Galactic is a real time strategy game in space where you build up your planets and ships to conquer your enemies. Develop your planets and fleet of spaceships to destroy your enemies and take over the galaxy! Do you have what it takes to become the best Fleet Captain the UFMC has ever seen?

name: XenoWorld: The Rondeau of Astra
description: "The Rondeau of Astra" is a war chess game that combines war chess, cards and Rogue. You will control the "Controller", defeat all enemies in the foggy forest level after level, and uncover the secrets of the different world "Astra Continent"......

name: Cyberlinxx
description: Experience the thrills of a cyberpunk adventure with a cast of strong, independent women. Dive into the shadows of the Megacity Arriaka and find out who wanted to kill you.

name: Tyler Tactics
description: Join Tyler Tactics on an absurd action-comedy adventure as he faces off against corrupt politicians, rival businessmen, and innocent bystanders alike.

name: Secret Summoner
description: A young fledgling hero sets out on a journey to teach misbehaving monsters a lesson. But little does he know his own mother tags along to support the youngster from the shadows in this action puzzle game!

name: Gloop
description: Gloop is a 3D platformer where you play as a parasitic slime that aims to take over the world. Control and infect creatures to cover the world in slime.

name: SokoMelody
description: Solve puzzles in this old school style Sokoban, and help the composers with their songs.

name: That Last Girl
description: First person, Indie, horror survival game. Use light and sound-based strategies to evade the ghost and achieve objectives to unlock the extended ending.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - Hamburg Flyer SVT 877
description: The Hamburg Flyer, a train consisting of two cars – each having a driver's cab and passenger cabin – was ordered by the Deutsche Reichsbahn-Gesellschaft in 1932 from Waggon- und Maschinenbau AG Goerlitz (WUMAG). The train was delivered in 1932 and put into service in 1933.

name: Make me Float
description: Solve puzzles and overcome challenges with cooperation and “connection” … as a balloon

name: Time's Disillusion
description: Time's Disillusion is a linear visual novel. It's been two years since a friend was lost. Despite everything, the final race ended in tension, a crash, and no hope of contact. Today, there's no time for those things at the restaurant; not in this downturn. That dream was over. Or so he thought.

name: The Missing Parts of Maria Gwozdek
description: The Missing Parts of Maria Gwozdek is a dark fantasy visual novel about fulfilling your aspirations by sacrificing parts of yourself. Literally.

name: Lightwood
description: Lightwood is an immersive semi-open world Metroidvania. Master your skills and fight magnificent Lords as you unravel the ancient mysteries behind the kingdom's decay.

name: The Infernal Masquerade
description: The Infernal Masquerade is a gothic horror PS2 -inspired take on the classic minesweeper game along with resource management, where taking risks and doing speedy reveals gives you access to helper items that make it easier to find the hidden, masked vampires.

name: Animal Across: Afrika
description: Animal Across: Afrika is a puzzle game set in an African biome. Here you must feed endemic animals to this biome with their natural food.

name: Sanonta
description: Sanonta is a simple memory/clicker game where you unlock funny sayings and proverbs from Finland. May contain: snow, cute animals, a pretty Finnish girl and sisu.

name: The Neverland of the Mountain and Sea
description: Falling in love with a robot girl!

name: Intergalactic Panic!!
description: Jump and shoot your way through forgotten oceans and into fortresses filled with powerful enemies. Decide the best order to complete the challenges and each stage will give you an amazing new power to help you on your next journey and perhaps end the tyranny of the evil Intergalactic Empire.

name: Paranormal Girlfriend
description:
Welcome to Paranormal Girlfriend, a visual novel with elements of 3D investigation, a mystical atmosphere and a gripping plot.
Takashi, a writer, a man who rarely leaves his house without opening the curtains, discovers that he has a girl in his apartment! He doesn't know who she is or how she got there. Maybe he's already going crazy, or maybe it's worse than that...
Enter the mysterious world of Paranormal Girlfriend and enjoy a thrilling story full of mystery and enigma.
You will have to explore 3D locations, make choices, interact with the objects of the environment.

name: Anime Knight: Card Game
description: Anime Knight: Card Game game that blends deckbuilding and turn-based strategies on a warzone. Combine different cards strategy to overcome unique challenges you will face. But be careful.

name: Viticulture: Essential Edition - Tuscany Expansion
description: The Tuscany Expansion includes 3 new features: An extended game board, special workers and structures. Choose which features you want to play with or simply play with all of them!

name: Mine Battles
description: Mine Battles - Discovery of Mezopotamia is an action and adventure game with a single player game mode. Discovery of Mezophotamia, the second game in the Mine Battles series, is a single player game with a TPS-style perspective. Fight by doing missions and solve the secret of Mesopotamia.

name: Letterswirl
description: At last, a word game with splendor. Sit down with a friend and let Letterswirl’s mysterious vibe and unusual circular approach to spelling help you enjoy a meditative moment together. Or practice by yourself and see how you do on the global leaderboards. To really get into the flow, lose yourself in Timelapse mode, a circular word-search which will push your word-spotting abilities to the limits. As the clock accelerates, watch the stars turn above you and the skies blaze with electric fire.

name: Pro Feel Golf
description: Pro Feel Golf brings a fresh approach with unique and innovative controls that allow ease of use but with depth to grow your game. Become a golfing legend using intuitive one touch controls.

name: Boku Boku
description: Boku Boku is a blocks-building game, you can use blocks to create your own world, a unique playground that is only for you.

name: Space Max
description:
Destination: Earth. Gas-engine: ON.
Get ready for a noisy takeoff! Help Max the Astronaut Monkey get back home with his high-tech jetpack, famously powered by eco-friendly flatulent energy. Rip through space thanks to this powerful yet all-natural gas that lets you fly higher and higher!
After a crash landing on planet Cowa-426, our brave hero discovered that the only way to get home was through the power of flatulence. Help him collect scrap metal to build powerful space suits. Careful though! The journey through space isn’t exactly a piece of cake (or cut of cheese…)! Watch out for space cows, asteroids, and other silent but deadly perils of the universe.

name: Hillbilly Burgers
description:
Welcome to Hillbilly Burgers!
Help Patty Motts stack as many hamburgers on his plate without them falling off!
How many can you stack?

name: Bearadise 2: Big Bear Shuffle
description: Sin descripción

name: Triangle 180
description: Embark on an adventure to help Mi overcome 180 Triangle Trials! Create triangles and capture all the dots and goodies along your way to unearth the mystery behind the "Triangulum".

name: Jelly Zoo
description: Redeem your free ticket to the world’s first Jelly Zoo!

name: Battle Cars
description:
Welcome to the world of Battle Cars.
Battle Cars is a classic arcade top-down racing game with fast mini cars and funny weapons to destroy your opponents!
Play the career mode to upgrade your cars and unlock new tracks, or go online to play with your friends

name: Turbo Grid
description:
In a far distant future, racing has evolved into a whole new dimension. Super fast space ships replaced traditional vehicles and gone all the known roads with new kind of challenge on a deep space racing track. It's dangerous as well, so are you up to this challenge?
Turbo Grid is a fast paced racing / shooting experience setup in a ray like race track. Your aim is to go as far as you can with simply tapping each side of the screen to dodge from the obstacles. Your ship is fast, but becomes faster with speed up sections during the race. You should also collect gun item to get shooting capability in order to clean your way. Shield item can be usefull to collect as it'll help you in any of your dodge mistake. Boost takes your ship's speed into another level where you can fly over many obstacles at a glance. Orbs are the currency in this future, so collect them as much as you can and also a magnet item can help you ease in this purpose.

name: Mighty Muddy
description: Time to get muddy! Race through a dirty world in this intense, high speed racing game. The muddier you get the better your score, but hold on tight, because you get extra points for getting air! Just how far and how muddy can you get before smashing into an obstacle? Get on the leaderboard today!

name: PetrolHead: Epic Joyride
description: Petrolhead will provide you the high quality graphics and the driving experience you are looking for. Test your overspeed skills and drift skills on asphalt. Push your limits and step forward to become a master driver! Complete the missions, own the best cars and challenge worldwide drivers!

name: Clash of Ultimate Fighters
description:
This is a must play Ultimate Fighter Shooter!
Make combinations of three or more head bubbles to score points. The more your shoot at once the more points you will get!
Take on the ultimate fighters alone or play with friends and get the highest score.

name: Nood Climbrs
description:
Bare-it-all in a risqué climb to the top!
In Nood Climbrs you control a noodley-limbed (and scantily clad) climber while they explore a carefully designed climbing wall, streak to new heights, and unlock outrageous new outfits.
Master the simple & unique climbing mechanic which challenges you to gain mastery over gravity and test the limits of your spaghetti-armed body!

name: Pixel Cup Soccer
description: Pixel Cup Soccer is a retro-style arcade soccer game with simple controls and fun, addictive gameplay. Choose from 32 national teams to play friendly matches, the Pixel Cup championship, and awesome fun player-versus-player matches!

name: Beach Boing
description: Young Timmy hates the sudden invasion of Yoga Beach fanatics on his favorite beach. Its time he really taught them how to let it go.

name: Deep Lake Reel Fishing
description:
Enjoy the ultimate pocket fishing experience!
Grab your bait, rod, and reel and head out on the lake for some deep lake reel fishing all around the world. New fish and locations added weekly!
The world of fishing is at your finger tops. Catch big or small fish, upgrade your gear, upgrade your skills, upgrade your fishing level...Compete with friends…
Become the ultimate mobile fisher!

name: I Like Being With You
description: This is a sweet game in which the player control a rabbit running around the moon with another rabbit (his/her lover). The game is simple in control and has very pleasant grahpic and sweet music.

name: Cubic Hole
description:
Enjoy in space,
3D three-dimensional puzzle game.
This game will be a help to improve intelligence.
Stage 60 kinds of mysterious and amazing puzzle game,

name: Whack an Office Jerk
description:
Whack An Office Jerk & Boss is a free game, your chance to whack em all over the head, and experience a satisfying calm peaceful feeling....
after you kick some major butt!!!

name: Hyperbahn
description: Engage yourself in a exciting fast paced mobile game where speed is unlimited. Control and maneuver a space jet spiraling through the confines of hyperspace. Collect energy orbs to gain points and the more orbs you collect the faster your space jet becomes. As you gain speed become cautious of the explosive red asteroids. If you come in contact with the asteroids your jet will explode upon impact.

name: Bobble Bunch: Ultimate Pet Adventure
description:
Bobble Bunch is the kind of game that might seem easy to play at first but it will instantly immerse you in an outlandish world that will turn your hands sweaty quite fast.
Travel through mesmerizing portals, avoid the green orbs and try not to get caught by the deadly electricity beam. Using simple controls, all you need are fast reactions and cunning timing in order to reach the blue saving light.
Bobble Bunch is all about guiding your bobble pets through a mysterious world while facing wicked obstacles and devilish traps.
Do you think you have what it takes to save them?

name: Jumping Jack's Skydive
description:
Take Jumping Jack on a skydiving adventure through 5 worlds and 50 challenging levels! Guide Jack as he jumps out of the plane and drops through crazy and unbelievable obstacles — like the jumbo planes, hot air balloons, blimps, helicopters, drones, birds, UFOs and more!
You must fly Jack down after each plane drop and deploy the parachute at the right time in order to land successfully. Fly through the City, Desert, Ocean, Forest and Space!

name: Railway Escape
description: Battle hundreds of monsters and survive as long as you can in Railway Escape. Protect your train at all costs and upgrade your arsenal of weapons to become more powerful in this Bullet Hell game. It is up to you to clear a path to safety for you and the passengers on the last train to freedom on earth. Exciting gameplay, hordes of monsters, many weapon combinations and thrilling music will make Railway Escape your goto game when you have a few minutes to spare.

name: Golf Impact
description:
Clash against competitors and enjoy fast 1:1 PvP matchmaking.
Dynamic ball trajectory due to in-game weather!
Beautiful and realistic graphics and courses.
Championships where great prizes await!

name: Fans of Soccer: Disc Football
description:
Are you ready to be the soccer legend and hero you always dreamed to be?
The time is now – the ball is in your court – run, take aim, strike….and…goal! You did it for your team and you are ready to lift the cup.
How exciting. And what if we tell you that you can experience this excitement every single day, whenever you please. Yes, with the Fans of Soccer game all you need is your smartphone to play soccer in true competitive style while competing with players from all over the world in online football-themed disc game matches gushing with adrenaline.

name: Luminosus
description: Luminosus is a unique and challenging puzzle game that combines the fun of matching colors with the strategic gameplay of Tetris. In Luminosus, players must match 4 or more blocks of the same color to score points or combine them into other colors to score even bigger.

name: The Salt Keep
description: The Salt Keep is a text adventure (think interactive fiction with Choose Your Own Adventure and RPG mechanics) and should feel familiar to fans of classic gamebooks and fantasy fiction in general.

name: Hyperdrome
description:
Two cars. One race track. And a whole arsenal of power-ups. Welcome to the dynamic racing world of the future.
The first car across the finish line wins the race – that's how racing was and that's how racing will always be. Yet with ever-faster cars and perfected racing lines, motorsport soon became too predictable. In a bid to bring fun back to the sport, ways of combat, subterfuge, and special abilities were added to the cars.

name: A Great Escape
description:
Run Run Run for your cat life
Simple game, simple play style, but it very interesting.
Play it and enjoy it

name: MimeDrink: The drinking game
description: The game works like a game of virtual cards. Placed randomly, they will generate sentences that a person will have to guess to his team to make their opponents drink. Most of the time, these sentences will be very easy to mimic despite their totally twisted and absurd content.

name: Racing Manager
description: Manage your very own Racing Team. Compete in amazing 3D in high action races, controlling your drivers orders and helping them boost to victory!

name: Toppluva
description: Hit the slopes and shred your way down the mountain! Ski through over 45 levels across 8 different mountains. Complete levels and missions to unlock new characters.

name: J.J's Tennis Tour
description:
J.J is a rookie on the world tennis tour.
Travel around the world playing in the first to 5 tournaments against the top opponents.
Practice in the training zone to earn coins and customize J.J’s appearance as well as levelling up your skills to stand a better chance against your opponents.
J.J will make friends on the tour in the pre-tournament lobby as well as having to learn to deal with trash talking from opponents.
Can you help J.J become the world champion?

name: Rolling Rapids
description:
Take a crazy ride down the most adventurous river the App Store has to offer.
Roll, duck and jump your way out of incredible and ferocious obstacles like snapping crocodiles, polar bears, fishermen, piranhas and snakes!
Collect golden rubies to unlock and ride with the pirate ship, surfer dude, blue whale, jet ski, swimmer, dolphin, cruise ship, dragon and more!

name: Ding Dong Delivery
description: The paperboy is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: Thomas & Friends: Race On!
description: Meet Thomas and his engines friends on the rail! With the new Augmented Reality (AR) and Voice Control function, meet your favorite engines in the real world and speak with them! You can also set up races, choose your favorite engines, and tap the screen to make the engines run faster to win races in this fun, kid-friendly racing adventure.

name: David Haye's Jungle Rumble
description: David has his jungle holiday interrupted by his arch-enemies. Take control of the former Heavy Weight Champion and apply the noble and gentlemanly art of boxing to the faces of all in his way!

name: Super Roboy
description: Deep in the Nevada desert, in a secret underground government facility, a young robot boy is awakened by an unknown force. He finds the building infected with alien creatures and hostile robots… With his memory wiped, he sets out to uncover secrets of his - and the facility’s - past.

name: The Last Vagabonds
description: The Last Vagabonds is set in a zombie apocalypse. Fight against zombies and travel with a friend or alone through the forsaken world.

name: Harpoon Shooter! Nozomi
description: Shoot the harpoon and pull the enemies! Pull them in close and defeat for a higher score. For beginners, collect sweets instead of beeing attacked. You can enjoy retro and kawaii pixelarts, and deep game mechanics.

name: Swimming Poo
description: Swimming Poo is a humorous action game that combines the arcade style of gameplay with the freedom of the sandbox world. It focuses on escaping from enemies, interacting with the world and fighting in its own unique way.

name: Blocktiful
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you combine resources and create your own amazing world.

name: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR
description: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR is a puzzle game which takes place in the ocean's depths. You play as a penguin thief who must guide his teammate to escape from the casino with the loot.

name: Market Simulator
description: Run your own business as a market owner! Customize your shop, manage your stock, serve your customers and expand your business. While you are busy making money be careful with the robber!

name: Iron Side
description: Iron Side is an FPS with cool perks and features. It's unique gameplay style offers so much. Come join the community and you won't be disappointed.

name: Abyss
description: Abyss is a story-oriented horror game. Players will explore abandoned tourist facilities with abnormal phenomena in the first person, looking for various clues, and unraveling the buried past.

name: Forgotten Mines
description: Wreak vengeance and retake lost mines from goblins, orcs, skeletons, and demons in this small-scale tactical roguelite RPG. Build the perfect expedition team and turn the underworld red with each challenging, fast-paced run.

name: Mr Rex's Zealous Adventure
description: The Fast-paced Space Dinosaurs Adventure!​

name: Bit Oz: Wonder Crusher
description: Aim, Shoot, Wall of Worlds.Bit Oz Wonder Crusher is a deck-building action shooting game with roguelike elements. Experience the fun of aiming and shooting!

name: The Prey's Turn
description: The Prey's Turn is an action platform where you are a cute animal and need to save your friends from predators. Now, It's the PREY'S TURN!

name: Skera VR
description: Skera is a single-player puzzle-solving action adventure VR game. Imprisoned within a colossal Tower, you must work with and against the resident AI. Sword in hand, carve your way through puzzles, obstacles and enemies in order to reactivate the mysterious tower and return home.

name: Star Rabbits
description: The rabbits being trained at the Knights Training Center on the Rabbit Planet of the Space Republic!! Dodge and defeat various stages full of random elements, obstacles, and enemies, and try to graduate from the training camp while recording high scores and fast clear times!!

name: Labyrinth of Chaos
description: Medieval first-person game with dungeons and puzzles

name: Backrooms Break
description: Experience the ultimate psychological horror in Backrooms. Armed with only a hammer and revolver, you must fight for survival in a never-ending maze of abandoned rooms. Can you keep your sanity long enough to escape the clutches of the Backrooms?

name: Word x Word
description: A battle of wits against a friend, or the computer! Reveal words to discover their common theme; gain enough points, and you'll secure a place on the hall of fame!

name: Restricted Footage
description: “Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.

name: FinalCypher
description: FinalCypher is a community-governed free-to-play team-based strategic hero FPS game developed by Station Zero X. FinalCypher utilizes bleeding-edge technology to empower players to truly own their in-game assets. Join the Kill-to-Earn era.

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout - Encore Edition
description: A narrative puzzle-adventure game based on Brian Jacques' Redwall️ book series. Vicious searats are invading the once peaceful Mossflower wood and it's up to the Lilygrove Scout Corps' newest recruit to save the day. Play as Sophia or Liam on their adventure to Redwall Abbey!

name: Diceheart
description: Diceheart is a roguelite dungeon-crawler with turn-based tactical dice battles. Delve deep into the Quantum Realm, gather powerful reality-bending items, upgrade your dice, and conquer luck itself!

name: Bebop
description: Bebop is a private investigator that gets himself mixed with... THE MOB. And he regrets his actions, then comes back home a hero, after having tried to kill an innocent man and having tried to end him in a hospital.

name: Toroban
description: Toroban is an infinitely wrapping puzzle game.

name: The kidnapped: Escape Room
description: You have been kidnapped and you find yourself trapped in an unknown house. In this escape room with a dark setting, you will have to solve different puzzles to get out of there. Will you be able to escape and survive?

name: StarVaders
description: Defend the Earth from an alien invasion in the ULTIMATE fusion of deckbuilding and grid-based tactics. Pilot a mech, discover game-breaking combos, and protect the future of humanity in this endlessly replayable roguelike.

name: Beef Jerky
description: A short-form RPG about a young man who lives with his sickly older sister. Struggling to support the both of them, he comes home from work one day to find something strange at his front door...

name: Haunt Monster
description: Haunt Monster is third person shooting monster game. Your mission is shoot the monsters that have been mutated. From the offices, warehouses, tunnel and mysterious laboratories have become hiding places for monsters, zombies, ghosts. They are coming, haunting and destroying the city.

name: Broken Note
description: A big world RPG adventure puzzle game that uses electric guitar and music elements to fight and solve puzzles, you need to find meaning and hope with your guitar in the dilapidated end world.

name: Burst Hero
description: Burst Hero is a pixel roguelike shooting survival game. You can choose heroes with different abilities and use various weapons to resist a steady stream of enemies. In the battle, you can customize your build by weapons bullets and cards. Each battle will have different experiences and challenges.

name: Cat's Request
description: Cat's Request is a fantastic point-and-click adventure in which you play as Ash the alien cat and his virtual assistant.

name: Nessy the... Robot
description: Fight your way through zombified robots, slime creatures, and a multitude of other enemies & bosses, as well as a plethora of levels, secrets & easter eggs to discover, collectible gems to... well... collect, as well as characters & dogs to talk to.

name: Whispers of West Grove
description: A heart-pounding adventure taking place in the twisted town of West Grove. Play as a patient trapped in a world where dream and reality begin to blur. Use light to solve puzzles, reveal hidden items, and transform objects to explore in a way like never before.

name: Trap of Musk: Europe Night
description: An exotic love story set in the land of hot sand. The target, who has never truly loved a woman. And the client, who loves women in a twisted way. How will you manage between these two? Who is it that destroys the sacrifice of thirsty love--?

name: Save Da Frogs
description: Save Da Frogs is an immersive, third-person, physics-based platforming adventure where you get to decide your very own Frog destiny. Hop your way through unique platforming stages and puzzles using physics-based controls.

name: Idun
description: Explosive singleplayer action RTS with a story campaign. Hold the line against massive swarms on a fully simulated battlefield.

name: Spirits of the Silicium Forest
description: You have been chosen as a sacrifice to the merciful gods. A great honor to be proud of. But why do you feel so uneasy? Create your own unique build and reveal the secrets of the Silicium Forest on a journey full of dangerous turn-based battles, mysterious encounters and fateful decisions.

name: Szybowcowa '87
description: Step back in time to the 1980s and step inside an apartment in a modernistic block in Wrocław that houses a secret printing house of Fighting Solidarity. Discover in VR authentic digitalized collections of the Institute of National Remembrance.

name: Seed of Pandora: Legend of the Gaia Tree
description: Embark on an epic adventure across the continent of Pandora as you meet helpful companions along the way that will become lifelong friends. Discover the many secrets of this fully realized 16 bit style world. Beautiful anime cutscenes bring the story to life with gorgeous hand drawn art.

name: Night&Scape
description: Night&Scape is a cooperative board game for up to 4 players. Explore the world of dream, find dream's shard and escape ! The fate of this world is up to you.

name: ChronoCodex
description: Conquer the trials through platforming and dodging hazardous zones to ascend to the top.

name: Cornucopia
description: Puzzle platformer for the GBA, now on PC!

name: Furry Reich
description: Furry Reich - an exciting game consisting of a series of exciting mini-novels with fluffy girls. Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Stay in
description: This is a casual action horror FPS game with surprises and thrills and jumpscare. Utilize a wide variety of items and various actions to find the suitcase in the pitch-dark hotel where horrifying creatures roam.

name: Moleshine Cooking Simulator
description: Moonshine? BORING! You will cook MOLESHINE! Grow ingredients in your garden, make moonshine and upgrade it with the main ingredient - a pesky mole that wants to eat your crop!

name: Chess Morph: The Queen's Wormholes
description: An original puzzle game inspired by chess. Control a lonely Queen with shapeshifting abilities and defeat the enemy army. Move wisely, explore the wormholes on the board, take the enemy shape and kill them all.

name: Striden
description: Loot, Build, Plunder and send the radio signal for freedom. Striden is the fast-paced, sandbox looter shooter survival game that you've never experienced before.

name: Welcome to Free Will: Episode 3
description: Welcome to Free Will - Episode 3 is the third episode of a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel game. You play as a young man who travels to a small town looking for his missing mother. As you soon find out, the town is packed with many beautiful women.

name: Cat + Dog
description: Control the cat and dog at the same time so they can collect their favourite snacks. The cat loves fish and the dog wants bones! The cat must not touch the bones and the dog must not touch the fish. A relaxing puzzle game with Sokoban elements.

name: A Terrible Place
description: What seems like a simple mission turns into a fight for survival as the island wakes up to greet its new arrivals.

name: 1 Trait Escape
description: An action rogue-lite set in the 1 Trait Danger universe. Fight your way through swarms of enemies and bosses with minigames sprinkled in-between. Grow stronger every time you fail until you are able to escape back to Earth.

name: CodeReactors
description: Build your own Magic Deck and set off on a quest in this magical battle-packed 2D-action RPG.

name: A Lonely Cabin Trip
description: You were supposed to have a relaxing cabin trip on a island all alone but after several strange encounters you had a mystery to solve, will you be able to survive a first-person psychological horror game or will you run away?

name: Escape The Escape Rooms
description: A mind twisting and puzzle filled horror escape simulator. Plan your escape to freedom by finding keys, completing puzzles and either work as a team or go for freedom on your own. But be warned you are not alone in there.

name: System Escape
description: Can you escape this difficult underground facility? Robots listen for your every move and cameras monitor sensitive areas. You'll find a utility device and laser gun, but being stealthy will be your best chance at staying alive! Made for VR, but supports non-VR play too.

name: Grinded Meat
description: Sheriff Walter is investigating on a series of missing person cases in the small town of Quiete hill. A misterious phonecall lead him to the Carson’s mansion on the country side. There he will find a bloodthirst killer that will chase him to grind his flesh. Will you survive? Quick time events

name: Fancy!
description: Fancy! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game Fancy! You will find many bright and varied visuals and very beautiful music.

name: Amanda's Magic Book 5: Hansel and Gretel
description: Join Amanda’s new match-3 adventures in a remake of the popular fairy tale Hansel and Gretel. Help Amanda save her nephew Cedric from the wicked witch!

name: OMSI 2: Iveco Bus-Familie Urbanway
description: This bus is the successor of the Irisbus Citélis. Despite its similarity to its predecessor, the Iveco Urbanway is lighter and more spacious. With the AddOn Iveco Bus Family Urbanway, this bus is now featured as a virtual variant in the OMSI simulator.

name: StarRaver
description: Hang out with your friends and party in this sci-fi music experience! Visit the unique clubs defining Starcade Arcade and enjoy the casual multiplayer party games in each room.

name: Kings Shire
description: Build your dream castle and defend it against invaders in this unique building game with complex economy, in which every good is simulated.

name: Demonic Labyrinth
description: Demonic Labyrinth is an Action Roguelike with RPG elements. You find yourself in closed labyrinth littered with a pile of earth and stones. To get out, you have to clear your way and look for the right solution. labyrinth, fighting off a crowd of undead, which has long been waiting for a victim.

name: Sex and the Furry Titty 3: Come Inside, Sweety
description: Sex and the Furry Titty 3 is turning the heat up to the max! More sex, more tittes and more wild furry ladies! Five new VOICE ACTED scenarios will plunge you even deeper into the throbbing warmth full of seductice choices. Conquer the match-3 challenges, enjoy the most tempting animated scenes yet.

name: Outbreak 2030
description: 2030, The year Russia decided to end the war with a powerful weapon, as they claimed. Shortly after using that weapon, Russia went dark. Ceasing all communications and locking its border. That's when The U.S. sent a task force for infiltration and reconnaissance. To find out what went wrong.

name: Arcane Tower Defense
description: Build your own towers by choosing and combining randomized upgrades. Would you like an anti-air tower that leaves its targets with a burning effect? Lightning attacks that deal Splash damage and bounce from enemy to enemy? There are over 25 million possible combinations!

name: Orbital Bombardment
description: Orbital Bombardment is a unique space shooter game, with retro vibe and synthwave music. You orbit around planets and bombard the evil aliens to save the galaxy. Use different space ships with unique weapons to your tactical advantage to defeat the planetary defenses and to destroy the enemies.

name: The Lone Alien
description: This is a story about an alien who had a shipwreck on a planet where people lived and now he needs to figure out how he can leave this planet.After all, people's technologies are far behind those that he has on the planet.

name: Builder Simulator VR
description: In Builder Simulator VR, you will take on the role of a real builder and feel as if you are standing on a construction site. Design, create, and complete your project. Plan every detail and see your construction from different perspectives. Use a variety of materials and tools.

name: Idling Gears
description: Click! Place gears, click! Make money, click! Place more gears, click! Make even more money, click, click and above all click!

name: Dawn of Shadow
description: Evil lurks the realm! An ancient force is awakening from it's ashes. Dawn of Shadow set in a Low-Fantasy Medieval World. Choose your path and dive into a tale of epic fantasy in this action RPG title!

name: Plushie Bomber
description: Blow your enemies up with their own bombs in this explosive 2D action platformer! Catch the deadly plushies' bombs in time to throw them right back to the sender! Will you uncover the cute fluffy toys' origins?

name: Orpheus
description: Revive Orpheus story to save Eurydice

name: Meticulous
description: Meticulous is a gamified personal health companion that will help you automate your diet and fitness planning. Define your own measures of success, design a custom program week-by-week to achieve your goals, and become your own personal health scientist!

name: Courier Chief Tycoon
description: Develop the distribution network in your city and turn your warehouse into a big company. Hire motor couriers, deal with customer complaints and at the same time make sure you don't run out of products.

name: BlueTricks
description: All five members of our team are majoring in game science and like to make games. Our team will grow into a company that can compete with 3N within 10 years, and we are working together to create games to create the new world of contents.

name: Fantasy Tavern Simulator
description: Fantasy Tavern Simulator is a first-person 3D fast-paced simulator game. Serve beer, prepare food, furnish your tavern and take part in random events like brawls, royal feast or occult rituals. Make your guests feel welcome. Make your Tavern known!

name: Regency Solitaire II
description:
Revisit romantic Regency Britain to build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Tour historic hotspots, silence gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree. Play your cards right to unlock bonus levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

Revisit romantic Regency Britain and build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Brought to you by the creators of the hit casual card game, Regency Solitaire.

Play your cards right as you tour must-see locations around Britain, from grand houses to vast landscaped gardens and cultural hotspots.

Resolve a tangled web of family secrets to help Bella silence the gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree.

Unlock gameplay features with your makeover project, and reveal bonus 'Collector's Edition' levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

name: Castle Of Plague
description: Fight against different enemis in various chapter. Improve your charater's level and determine your best strategy with the money you earn by killing enemies. Will you use your money for a better weapon, or will you spend it for magic potions? Be ready and prepared for the boss!

name: PinCol
description: PinCol is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, a fast tactical Bullet Hell with Upgrade elements and Special abilities to obtain, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!

name: Withersworn
description: Unleash your powers as a Withersworn in this high action, high mobility, and high fantasy adventure.

name: MotorCubs RC
description: MotorCubs RC is a savage offroad racing game set in a gorgeous rendition of Monument Valley. Single Player and Local Multiplayer using 4 classes of vehicles!

name: Dead Metal
description: 1-4 player co op roguelike with turn based combat and an emphasis on exploring randomly generated dungeons in order to find loot and complete missions

name: Project Slime
description: In Project Slime: Outbreak, you'll battle against an army of infected slimes to save the world. Collect items, unlock special abilities, and upgrade your skills as you take on challenging bosses and explore a variety of environments. Can you emerge victorious in this fast-paced action game?

name: Antimatter
description: Antimatter is a sandbox strategy game, colonise planets, build your city on the surface or the underground. Build your spacestation or control your own spaceships to explore a huge and living galaxy !

name: Demon Lord Tamer
description: You must evolve your own pet demon to destroy the world.

name: Brutal TD
description: Brutal TD is a minimalist retro-styled tower defense game. Unlike most tower defense games, Brutal TD has you in complete control of your tower, you can choose what enemies to fire at, which enemies you prioritize, and more. Each level gets more challenging and has different enemy types.

name: Magic to Master: M2M
description: Magic to Master is a player-friendly, open-world far east MMORPG with unique combat system and a game world that sets no limits to the game experience. Become a part of the legendary action MMO! Show your skills to your enemies in epic PvM and take part in brutal Battleground PvP!

name: Blacklight
description: A combo-oriented fighting game with a simple system. Players who are familiar with fighting games will be able to play right away thanks to its responsiveness and ease of understanding! Fly, run, solidify, and collapse!

name: Cape of Storms
description: The main goal of "Cape of Storms" is to portray the horrors of sailing into the unknown. The fears and the insecurities of the Portuguese will take the form of monsters as they demonize the player.

name: Alive Paint
description: To all the creative kids, teenagers, and their parents: meet a digital coloring book that animates itself! Paint its desaturated pages with vibrant colors to breathe life into its inhabitants, and they will show you a little performance in return!

name: Time Titans VR
description: Time Titans VR is a Singleplayer action shooter that allows the user to manually slow down time to get an advantage in combat. Shoot, punch and slice through enemies while slowing down time to unleash mayhem or dodge counter attacks.

name: Office Mayhem
description: A third person action game where you are sick and tired of working your BS job for your BS boss. You have officially lost your mind and are ready to cause absolute mayhem and chaos in your workplace. Turn ordinary office supplies into weapons of mass destruction and destroy your colleagues!

name: Finsternis
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Prison Break
description: This game has a fun aesthetic along with polished mechanics similar to AAA games. Every gun is something unique that you most likely haven't seen in other games. The prison/map has different path options giving good replayability.

name: Dark Box
description: You wake up on an island trying to remember your identity. The only thing you can do is: explore the island, and try to solve the puzzles one by one, leading to the ultimate truth.

name: Path of Yuusha
description: "Path of Yuusha" is a simulation game set in the Yuusha academy with life sim elements of decorating your room freely and attempting events at local town. Experiencing the daily life of a school student who is busy with classes and work, Manages your weekly schedule to become a splendid hero.

name: Magicube
description: A magical puzzle platformer made with PICO-8. Be thinky to get the legendary treasure.

name: Shapes & Shots
description: Shapes & Shots is a Roguelite Shooter Bullet-hell, where you can control time as you make your way through a twisted and delusional universe. Your enemies will merge, creating infinite combinations to try to overwhelm you: only your skills, combined with upgrades you choose, can lead you to victory.

name: Town Girls
description: You arrive at a small town and want to get busy with the local girls, but you must make them like you first...

name: Marshrutka
description: Marshrutka - A side view game where the player drives a vehicle and dodges obstacles on the roads, collects coins and waiting passengers on the road, the goal of the game is to drive as far as possible and collect passengers in time, otherwise the level of orders will drop.

name: Tickdown
description: You have two real-time hours to locate and defuse a weapon of mass destruction. Use the powers of Water, Earth, Fire, and Air to fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach your objective.

name: Manhattan
description: Manhattan is a hybrid music editor and coding language combining MIDI sequencing with powerful procedural generation features. Designed for both newcomers and experts, and running as a plugin or standalone, Manhattan makes both music and coding more accessible and expressive than ever before.

name: Chicken Coop
description: Chicken CoopThe hoomans are gone. The cow wants her pumpkin and the homestead is in need of your help!What animal will rise to feed the hungry cat and pet the dog?Chickens? With hats?Can they use the tools on the farm to save the day?Can they harvest the pumpkins to feed the cow?

name: MDF: Magical Defense Force
description: MDF: Magical Defense Force is a unique story focused Magical Girl Visual Novel, featuring a cast of strange and entertaining character, monster of the week action, comedy, a rocking soundtrack and artistically rendered fight scenes.

name: Elsia War
description: The continent of Elsia, where the struggle continues, will end with you. SRPG game, use limited resources to enhance unit power and win. The story faces major choices from time to time, live and die of characters, but also affect the forces that start the war and the progress of the plot.

name: Forest towers
description: Forest towers is a tower defense strategy in which you will have an exciting adventure.

name: Chivalrish
description: Chivalrish is a novella-sized, romance visual novel set in a medieval fantasy world. Set out on an adventure to rescue a princess who is not at all like you imagined her to be. Meet characters along the way, and decide your fate and theirs in this fun, comical, and thrilling journey.

name: Longevity Party
description: "Longevity Party" is an unconventional third-person shooter game. In this fun party, there is no death, you can't use guns to kill your opponent, you can only knock him out of the field, at the same time, you can also change the terrain, create random obstacles, Win the day.

name: Life Is Not Auto
description: Life Is Not Auto is a rhythm + survival based timing game. You manually control the organs to keep your character alive until life ends.

name: Moonlight Peaks
description: Experience life as a vampire in Moonlight Peaks! Master the art of potion-making and spell-casting, tend to your supernatural farm, and make your mark on the magical town. Befriend the local werewolves, witches and mermaids, and maybe even find eternal love along the way.

name: Love n Dream 3
description: 《Love n Dream 3》is a match-3 puzzle game with dating elements. Your job is to complete all the missions and adventures around you to help all the girls on your journey.

name: DarkMatter: The Strange Messenger
description: Explore the Earth that has been transformed by dark matter. Listen to the stories of life told by those who survived the harsh environment. You may not be able to hear their story. Why? You may find it hard to survive in this harsh environment. Don't give up! Your abandonment will make us sad.

name: VR Pterosaur
description: This is a VR shooting leisure game. Players need to protect their eggs within the prescribed time and will not be destroyed by other dinosaurs.

name: Leap From Hell
description: In this first-person puzzle platformer you will try to figure out the right way through each level and afterwards can try to improve your timings by finiding hidden paths and secret short cuts. Your goals are to sucessfully finish a level as well as to beat the fastest time of our level designers.

name: For Honor: Black Prior Hero Skin
description: Become the master of fate with the Commander Ravier Hero Skin, a full-body customization of the Black Prior.

name: Gninja Pig
description: Gninja Pig is a platformer 2D game with pixel art. A unique dose of cuteness with movements and attacks to take on challenges. Humans disappeared after a mysterious disaster, so you have to survive on your own but maybe you’ll find allies in your adventure.

name: The Land of Babel
description: Build and nurture the universe of your dreams with Land of Babel; an expansive simulation city builder. Construct and manage powerful empires, establish intricate and detailed economies, explore unknown lands, embark on captivating quests, and much more.

name: Kink.inc
description: The Kinkverse is yours, Vice Mayor! With an army of hot, loyal girls on staff, you are on the climb for political power and panty-dropping piles of cash. Run an empire of sex toys as you handle every lubed up mess your kooky mayor creates, and explore thematic universes to seduce more sexy babes.

name: Lovux
description: Lovux is a minimalist puzzle game where you try to break all glasses on the screen using different types of glass wisely.

name: Maze Nuts
description: Chase the golden nut through the always changing maze against up to 3 other players. Use certain strategies to prevent the others catch it before you do.

name: Majo Mail
description: Majo Mail is a short cozy game where you play as a witch, that is helping villages deliver letters. Fly around the floating village, Chat to village on their island. Find out what they like and dislike!

name: Exilium
description: Exilium is an atmospheric point & click project. As an exorcist, you will face demons and occult rituals. Cast out evil spirits with your skills and improvised means. Uncover dark secrets and restore balance before it's too late...

name: Heistfest
description: Heistfest offers an addictive and challenging gameplay with unique hand drawn black and white retro style graphics . The complete runtime destructible environment, free roaming maps and legendary vehicles make for an unforgettable experience.

name: Blood Red
description: Blood Red is a co-op survival horror game that can be played with 1-4 players. Hunt down demons by forming rituals, find out the demon type and banish the demon forever!

name: Seas of Strife
description: In a world dominated by a vast uncaring sea, greedy pirates stalk the open water and fantastical kingdoms wage devastating wars for what little land exists. It's time for you to assemble your fleet, set sail and plunder, trade or conquer your way towards your destiny!

name: Spurdo :D
description: Spurdo :D is an Action Adventure Comedy game where you play as Spurdo, travelling to different past lives, each containing its own separate story, style, and gameplay mechanics. Offering a wide variety of scenarios and humorous interactions, you choose how you want to experience those lives again.

name: Last Night on Actaeon
description: Can you survive the night? Your ship has crashed on the dark and hostile planet, Actaeon. You must use a variety of weapons, abilities and choose between game-changing upgrades to survive on a planet full of surprises.

name: Sokoban
description: This is a leisure puzzle game.

name: Turn Back the Clock: Hsinchu
description: This is a VR story exploration game with Hsinchu City, Taiwan as the main stage. The story is based on historical events in the Hsinchu area, supplemented by sci-fi elements of time travel to construct the entire worldview. The game adopts a dual-protagonist line.

name: Soccer Board
description: Soccer Board - is a turn-based board game. Football based game for one player. Move around the board, pass the ball, score goals and don't let your opponent take the ball. Play soccer on a board in this tactical movement game.

name: We're Party Together!
description: Easy to understand and simple casual game. Let's play 10 mini-games using WASD and arrow keys and run for a new record!

name: Tanks+: New Era
description: Pew pew pew! Its ww3? No it's just some tanks fun. Multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) video game with positive and dynamic battles 5x5 format.

name: Mushroom Collector Simulator
description: Mushroom Collector Simulator is a mushroom picking simulator that involves you in the hunt for many different mushrooms that grow in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walks through the forest, complete missions, upgrade your hut and equipment.

name: Trouble In Space
description: A Sci-fi Shooter with Pixel-art graphics and various mechanics such as slow motion and dashing. In some levels you also get a special assistant.. You will enjoy this space shooter game. make sure you ALWAYS KILL THEM ALL.

name: Seedless Light
description: Seedless Light is a 2d action-adventure game focused on combat and exploration with a unique and contemplative world of fantastic and vibrant creatures driven by a touching and atmospheric soundtrack.

name: Taxi Copter
description: Take on the role of a taxi driver in a crazy helicopter. Pick up passengers and drive them to their destination. Fight against the gravity, be gentle, it's a helicopter, not a tank! Earn money, get stars and unlock more levels. A city full of passengers (and pigeons!) is waiting for you!

name: Village and the Witch
description: Jump into a farmtastic bewitched adventure and help your king to defend village from witch.The king will take the opportunity to explain basic task and give you feel of your first fright of Witch Attack. The king introduces you to the possibilities of interaction with the environment & villagers.

name: Trap of Musk: Arabia Night
description: He, a serious-minded young king. And he, who grew up with you and followed behind you.When memories begin to come back and the real begins to unfold. The person in front of you is not the person in front of you. Who is it that indulges in the masquerade of complicity--?

name: Bank Tycoon
description: In a world where banks control countries, finances and armies, manage your bank and army to dominate the world. Based on actual banking principles, create relationships and strategies to manage finances and armies and lead your bank in turn-based grid game play

name: Yellow History
description: In this labyrinth, governed by his feelings, Thomas seeks his release. How to wake up from this nightmare? Is there a way out?

name: Enter the Slayer
description: Enter the Slayer and engage in fast paced, skill based, exciting isometric directional combat! Build your strength, customize your character and slay your competition! Fight to the top and experience challenging content that will test your skill!

name: Solaro
description: Solaro is a handcrafted open-world game set in the remote outskirts of an ancient galaxy. Follow a lone traveller on an interstellar journey, solving puzzles, probing planets, and recovering lost fragments of the past.

name: Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg Route
description: Take a trip to the late 2000s and experience frequent passenger and heavy freight services, be in control of classic and modern traction as you traverse through the heart of Northern Germany. Electric Containers and Karlsruher Kopf n-Wagens await in Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg.

name: Breathless Winds
description: After recovering from a painful incident, a closeted trans woman finds herself split between four possible paths - returning to sailing, becoming a healer, helping the resident witch, or joining a prince on a mysterious quest. A fantasy romance visual novel about love and self-discovery.

name: Cosmic Overdrive
description: Cosmic Overdrive brings fast-paced rounds of a VR sci-fi runner that prioritizes comfort, immersion and engagement. Physically maneuver your spacecraft with interactive machinery. Fly cautiously to survive, but not so cautiously that the portal closes before you can make it through.

name: Tower Alchemist: Defend Khaldoria
description: Defend the mystical kingdom of Khaldoria against invading enemies. Place your defense towers tactically smart to defend the king's lands. Prepare yourself for the cunning abilities of your enemies and achieve victory through your sophisticated strategy and precision.

name: A Symmetric Escape
description: A Symmetric Escape is a 3d puzzle exploration game where in order to escape you must solve isolated and environmental puzzles about... well... symmetry!

name: Aphotic
description: A retro textless Point'n Click.

name: Cosmos Survivors
description: Cosmos Survivors is an action roguelite where you fight waves of spaceships and combine powerful skills to discover game breaking synergies. Unlock new ships, weapons, keepsakes and customize your talent tree to climb ascension levels. Choose your abilities wisely and you'll become a space god.

name: BDSM Love
description: BDSM Love - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: The flower of desire
description: In the fragmented world after the "Sin of Seven Day", watch from four perspectives how the people in this world fight against the almost irreversible disaster, confront the fate written for them by the world, reveal their hearts, show their heartfelt desires, watch them tell their stories

name: GyroGunner
description: An omnidirectional scrolling twin-stick shooter with pixel art reminiscent of the 80's.

name: CarKour
