description: A new experience in car-related games based on the principle of Parkour , as it focuses on driving and controlling skill to pass a map consisting of seven levels of difficulty !!!! .The real challenge begins at the fourth level :) ,so it was not mentioned in the demo or screenshots .

name: Towers Together
description: Towers together is a cooperative tower defense game with cards. Combine your cards with your friends’ cards to achieve powerful combo, but get ready to fail and laugh together. Build towers, cast spells, have fun with friends!

name: Royale Battle: Warzone
description: Royale Battle: Warzone is a Near-Future Sci-Fi Battle Royale game set in the heart of the city. Play either solo, duos or squads and be the last to survive the Battle Royale

name: Emprise
description: Emprise is an Adventure-RPG that changes everytime you play, based on your decisions

name: Sakura Gym Girls
description: Shouhei is an average man who works at a second-hand bookshop with his sweet, shy colleague, Asa. His life is unremarkable, until Asa suggests that they join their local gym. There, Shouhei meets two attractive women, and his love life begins to look up.

name: Frack the World
description: Frack the World is a resource management game about successfully running a hydrofracking company while also dealing with the state of the environment.

name: Abathor
description: Abathor is a 2D arcade action platformer for up to 4 players. You are the last hope in defense of Atlantis, you’ll face hordes of enemies and countless challenges. Enjoy its pixel art and epic music. A cooperative and competitive game to achieve glory or death.

name: Shori Conquest
description: 7 Powerful Ancient Beasts have been Reawakened! Choose your hero, complete 10 challenging dungeons, find the Shori Stones, battle many strong foes, and put a stop to Purdrag’s plans!

name: Formula 2707: All Stars Kombat
description: Formula 2707 - All Stars Kombat is a combat driving simulator inspired by the great hits of the 2000s. It recreates the classic arcade game action and offers fun without speed limits. Formula 2707 offers a split-screen multiplayer mode for those who miss long couch nights with friends.

name: Subject
description: [SUBJECT] is a first-person psychological horror game. You wake up confused in a dark room, not knowing where you are. The last thing you remember is a robotic voice echoing through you ears. How you got here or why is unclear, but you do know one thing: You're being watched.

name: Planetary Strike
description: Planetary Strike is a chess-like competitive turn-based tactical strategy game where you assume the role of Commander. Guide your fleet of six unique ship types to victory by destroying the enemy’s planet while protecting your own.

name: Harmony Islands
description: Gather, craft and build your home on a randomly generated world made up of several islands. Explore the seas to find more islands with exciting unique items to bring back and use to craft. Build and supply a great ship to return home or stay on the island forever.

name: Gwen the Hen 64
description: Gwen the Hen 64 is a tiny 3D platformer collectathon, with precise controls and many different movement options.

name: Sex & Drift
description: Sex & Drift is a casual racing game. It`s a game where you can enjoy fast driving leaving far behind your opponents.

name: A Christmas Yarn
description: Welcome the holiday season with a cheerful match 3! Collect gold, gems and stars, and use it to decorate your Christmas tree! A Christmas Yarn features unique match 3 levels, jigsaws and a variety of mini games guaranteed to bring in Christmas cheer early!

name: Students of Light Bonds: Typing RPG with Character Creation
description: "Thank you!", "Became CEO!", "There is always next chance!" Combined cheerful positive words typing and RPG with character creation system for all party members! English translated texts and romanization examples are available for non-Japanese players. Let's defeat enemies with your own characters!

name: Marble Ball: Racing 2022
description: Marble ball racing 2022 is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 30 AI marble ball in 57unique track. You can control ball with left and right arrow key or A and D key.

name: Project Box
description: 2D horizontal scroll adventure game, interweaving unique art style, horror, suspense and fantasy. A horror secret is hidden in the apartment where lost children are going to be engulfed by nightmares.

name: Deluge: Sermon for the Dead
description: In the streets of Abbotsford, a girl daydreams of cataclysmic floods. Descend into the depths of her tempestuous sorrow. An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Spin Match
description: Inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi, Assemble towers by spinning pieces to get the right pattern on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Inanima
description: Inanima Be part of something that will change the future of humanity.

name: Four Hundred Catapults
description: City builder & Survival. When the dead get close enough, they can use the deadly fog to take control of your settlements. Build a strong economy to supply your warriors with long-range weapons and massive fortifications. This is the only chance to survive.

name: Super Skeleton Butler
description: As a skeleton butler, use your traps and magic to defeat hordes of do-gooder adventurers trying to steal your treasure in a tower defense/platformer mashup.

name: Apocalypse Factory
description: Apocalypse Factory is an automation game with tower defense mechanics. You get production orders to fulfill while defending your production lines against zombies and gangs.

name: I Wish it Was Morning All the Time
description: I Wish it Was Morning All the Time is a novel game released in 2021. It was first announced as a form that could be played with browser games and downloads. It was later ported to Steam.

name: Greedland
description: Welcome to Greedland, an exhilarating top-down shooter where you play as an interstellar mercenary. Battle through ever-changing environments and annihilate waves of enemies. If you enjoy the action-packed gameplay of Crimsonland and Vampire Survivors, Greedland is the perfect game for you!

name: Nightingale: Expanse
description: Take part in the wild and wonderful life of the Nightingale Universe! fight pirates and solve an ancient mystery!

name: Aery VR: Dreamscape
description: In Aery - Dreamscape you play as a bird like spirit who can enter the minds of other people in order to explore their thoughts, their secrets and their imagination. Experience the feeling of flying, immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes and enjoy the unique storytelling of the game... ​

name: Fell
description: In a beautiful word filled with secrets and exotic landscapes, a very chill creature is growing goblin spores in his garden. Then trains them to be sent off to war. Rogue-like dungeon adventuring meets gardening and exploration. Oh, and fishing!

name: R.H.
description: R.H. is a session-based online first person shooter. As a result of the division of the property of the former Russian Federation, territorial disputes arise between the newly formed states, some of which end in armed clashes that develop into a full-scale war.

name: Goblin Party
description: Match the monsters in this retro style puzzler inspired by classic games.

name: Shatter
description: Join a wide group of characters as they travel across the world searching for answers, fighting a brutal autocracy, and chasing Esfal Psychi, a man of malevolent ambitions, in the first RPG title from uNIC Studios.

name: Anime City
description: Anime City reinvents classic visual novel mechanics by transferring them into full 3D environment. Study at anime high school, engage in after school clubs, and attempt to win love of one of your classmates.

name: Rhythm Drive: Synthwave City
description: Drive around Synthwave City's open world while completing challenges to unlock new cars. Fully customize every detail of how your car drives or choose from a list of presets. Listen to synthwave, retro, vaporwave tracks and hit the notes to build your boost and pull off some impressive maneuvers!

name: Prisonfall
description: Prisonfall is arcade about escaping from a medieval prison. You are a prisoner in a prison with ghosts who used to keep order. It happened that you managed to get out of the shackles and now you can move freely throughout the prison. Can you go through all the tests and traps on the way to escape?

name: Not for Broadcast VR
description: Get closer to the truth than ever in the VR edition of Not For Broadcast. Keep the cameras rolling, censor the swears and immerse yourself in the powerful, alluring and occasionally deadly world of broadcast television news.

name: Survival Shot
description: Survival Shot designed for VR, Zombie apocalypse set for lone survivors. Uncover a sinister plan that takes survivors through Bridge/Town survival & Zombie Run. Be ready to cast undead into hell. Armed weapons with real-life movements to explore a post apocalyptic world in VR.

name: Brain Cell
description: Brain Cell is a co-operative multiplayer adventure game. Play up to 4 players co-op to explore dungeons, complete puzzles, with twisting gravity physics. Explore huge worlds with friends. Work together to complete mind bending puzzles and defeat bosses.

name: 2032: A New Threat
description: 2032 is an Indie game with unique features. By 2032, 50% of global vegetation had already been completely consumed by a pest called P-X. A world war arises for basic resources for survival. Spider, a renowned soldier of the armed forces is summoned.

name: Ragnarök TD
description: Ragnarök TD is a 2D top-down tower defense game created as a case study of Ninja Kiwi's Bloons TD 6 by the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio. Follow the story of a small village in the North as they fend off the beasts of Ragnarök in this revamped Steam iteration of the original project.

name: Stone Age: Digital Edition
description: Forge your way through the early days of recorded history and build the foundation of human civilization. How bright is humanity's future? It depends on You! Lead your Tribe through the Stone Age!

name: Starlight and the Silver Key
description: Starlight and the Silver Key is a strange puzzle game about saving the world after your own world falls apart. Solve puzzles. Whisper passwords into ears. Make something called a Greasy Joe and become best buds with a demon.

name: Docile Fright
description: Navigate cities and dungeons to find the source of the destructive phenomena.

name: OutRune
description: A modern take on the traditional roguelike genre. Take one of the characters on a dangerous journey through the twisted towers and try to escape your captors. Face fierce and mutated bosses at the end of each floor and use the unique and efficient crafting system to increase your chances.

name: Homebound: New Beginnings
description: Explore, craft, build and thrive in the magical lands of Solaria. Discover the curse that destroyed these lands and your connection to the past as you grow relationships between clans of magic and monsters, but maybe not all is as it seems?

name: Fears of Glasses o-o World War
description: In this game you have to overcome your fears in the war. Explosions, shots, weapons. Everything that you are afraid of, you will find in this game.

name: Aery VR: A Journey Beyond Time
description: In Aery – A Journey Beyond Time you are in the role of a flying god-like creature which observes the world and their inhabitants while they grow and evolve through time. Are you ready to explore time itself?

name: Fiz and the Rainbow Planet
description: Control little dragons and explore a world full of gimmicks! Fiz and the Rainbow Planet" is a 2.5D dot-picture action game in which players switch characters in a resourceful manner as they progress.

name: Earl's Minecart Adventures
description: Blast with amazing speed through mines and caves. Break through wood, stone- and steel. Evade flowing lava, falling rocks and hazardous machinery. Race, jump, fly with amazing speed across rivers and ravines. Looping, doors, saws, fire, high voltage, rocks, traps and more.

name: Escape!!
description: Escape!! is an endless runner through a haunted forest. Jump, slide, kick and close your eyes to survive. Beautiful handmade pixel art, with frightening monsters and a terrified survivor.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Midwestern Rails
description: Hills, forests, countryside - all to be expected in the Midwest. Operate long freights, stop at each station with Amtrak, or run locals and service the industries over this 420+ mile route. With over 71 industries to be serviced, you’ll be running trains for hours non-stop.

name: Harvest Hills
description: Harvest Hills is a charming and relaxing farm simulator that allows you to run your own rancho. Cultivate various crops, take care of animals, and produce homemade products. Sell the goods in the local market to earn money and use it to upgrade or automate the farm.

name: Endless Alice
description: "Endless Alice" combines Rogue-lite random elements with RPG strategic character development. In the game, you can explore maps to collect enhancement elements and interact with various creatures to gain special effects or alter gameplay.

name: Hazatron
description: Hazatron is top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements. Heavy mech doomed to fight endless hordes of alien mechanoids.

name: Propaganda Inc.
description: Build an ultimate propaganda empire and use your influence to become a president of your country... no, the ruler of Earth... or even better, the overlord of the Galaxy! Propaganda Inc. is a satirical idle game, allowing the player to create their own propaganda machine.

name: Wild Area
description: "Wild Area" is a game of survival and adventure while exploring wild areas. It is a rogue-like survival RPG game that produces production through gathering and hunting during the day, or goes on an adventure, and defends against zombies at night.

name: Paranormal Fear
description: Paranormal Fear is a 1-6 player online co-op ghost hunting game. Travel to locations to find and remove the evil spirit that resides there. not all the ghosts in these locations are evil, and some specialty ghosts will earn you extra cash if you are able to get a picture of them.

name: Arcane Wilds
description: Arcane Wilds is a western themed fantasy RTS with a unique twist on resource management. Resources can be harvested or stolen and then transported to the battlefield to enhance combat. Play cooperative missions for 1-4 players or competitively with up to 8 players or AI.

name: A Shaman's Ballard
description: Explore the mysterious world of Erenblad to protect the land from demonic entities and perform your shanar to become the new master shaman of Aahkray in this tactical turn-based RPG.

name: Plague of Yamorn
description: Cleanse the infected in Plague of Yamorn, a 2D metroidvania. Explore the ruined town of Yamorn and uncover the secrets behind its downfall. Find and craft new equipment, offensive and defensive items. Exploit the plagues empowering properties to gain new powers and abilities.

name: Time and Time again
description: Build settlements, prospect and mine minerals, recruit units and wage wars to dominate your neighbors.

name: Dotgeon
description: Dotgeon is 2D action-adventure arcade game. Survive on an open map - collect resources, kill enemies and collect three columns from stone to go to the portal. Interesting mechanics of this world will not let you get bored.

name: FaceValue
description: Discover a new world on your journey as a living die. Relax by solving dice-based puzzles in this Isometric Zen Puzzler. Take your time, explore each level and find all the hidden secrets this world has to offer.

name: ParaNormal Commute
description: (para)Normal Commute makes your everyday sardine-packed commute seem like a refreshing walk along a sunny beach... Solve puzzles and overcome challenges to complete your commute safely in this short first person puzzling journey!

name: Deep Sea Trip
description: Deep Sea Trip is a story of a deep water adventure. The deep sea has many natural dangers, but there are new dangers that threaten all deep sea and ocean life. A hero fish must save the day and figure out their way through the ocean and life.

name: Hidden Cats in New York
description: Meow meow! Kittens are hidden in New York, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!

name: Maximus 2: Street Gladiators
description: A fantasy beat-em-up that focuses on crunchy and satisfying combat. We captured the spirit of some of the best classic beat-em-ups, melding them into one memorable experience. Fight solo or with up to 4 players cooperative multiplayer!

name: Schachkampf
description: A fantasy chess game in a beautiful pixelart world. This is the game you always wanted on your SNES back in the days.

name: ToD Fragments: Special Fun
description: The events of this mini-game revolve around the main character of the Threads of Destiny game and his acquaintance with a mysterious lady from a brothel.

name: Pirates of Heaven
description: Pilot flying boats and swing from island to island using your grappling hook in epic 100-player battles in the sky.

name: Wizard's Wheel 2
description: An idle and incremental rpg, inspired by retro, turned based role playing games, Wizard's Wheel 2 comes packed with heroes to collect, loot to acquire, equipment to upgrade, and a ton of ways to progress. Recruit, equip, upgrade, and spin the Wizard's Wheel in this deep, retro idle RPG.

name: DunHero
description: Dunhero is Roguelike game where character is in procedurally generated dungeon. Hero has to explore a lot of different rooms, level up character and gather equipment to defeat all enemies and reach final stage.

name: No Name Village
description: No Name Village is a top-down adventure game, set in a peaceful village that is at risk of being swallowed by the Black Sea. Follow our boy protagonist as he explores, fight off monsters, and uncovers the situation of the world around him.

name: Dungeon in Grid Puzzles
description: This is a puzzle game using numbers. There are many monsters on a floor. The distance that the Lady Hilde can move is fixed, and she can only move to the position of an enemy that is weaker than her. And she becomes stronger every time she defeats a monster. Conquer up to 30 underground floors!

name: Meta Ball
description: Meta Ball, and again you get into the world of a rolling ball. Only this time there are thirty levels, and it’s fun. Easy control and insanely exciting passing obstacles with a rolling ball. Go around and jump over obstacles using only a mouse and a keyboard.

name: Dead World
description: Embark on a great journey through the dead world controlling Adam Jones, who will search for answers about the kidnapping of his friends, dodging death on more than one occasion

name: Retrocausality
description: Set in Akihabara between the years 2000-2069, Retrocausality follows a group of college students who survive an anomaly only to find themselves in the middle of a temporal war.

name: Aery VR: Broken Memories
description: You are a little bird that flies smoothly through thoughts, fears, and memories of an unknown person. ​Experience the feeling of flying, immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes, and enjoy the unique storytelling of the game while getting attached to the lovely main character.

name: Aery VR: Calm Mind
description: Aery - Calm Mind is an interactive game experience that is designed to relax your mind and soul. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - Hamburg Flyer SVT 877
description: The Hamburg Flyer, a train consisting of two cars – each having a driver's cab and passenger cabin – was ordered by the Deutsche Reichsbahn-Gesellschaft in 1932 from Waggon- und Maschinenbau AG Goerlitz (WUMAG). The train was delivered in 1932 and put into service in 1933.

name: Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf
description: With Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf, drive a model locomotive around a nostalgic 1980s living room and complete unique challenges before Christmas Morning arrives! Can you stop the mischievous Elf from ruining the big day?

name: Rebel Inc: Escalation - Dollars & Disasters
description: Rebel Inc.'s explosive new expansion! Survive an erupting volcano in Devil's Peak, burn through money with The Billionaire, enhance your tactics with new Special Advisors and explore exciting new Official Scenarios.

name: NoEL: Nothing on Elysion Line
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro Wave Thunder
description: Take control of a hyper radical super-powered gunboat, and battle enemy drones through intense naval warfare! With stunning retro graphics, and chaotic enemy AI, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat! Prepare for waves of enemies, and unleash your thunder!

name: Mystery Solitaire: Dreamcatcher 3
description: Play solitaire and solve the mysteries of the world of dreams!

name: Tank Rush
description: Tank based twin stick shooter action giving 4 player PVE coop fun, or enjoy a hectic PVP battle in various multiplayer modes.

name: The Unknown
description: You and Your Team Of 4 Players Hunt down Paranormal Entities While Trying to Survive The Night Solving Paranormal Cases of the Unknown in this Online horror Multiplayer Game

name: To the Top
description: It's her wish that you climb to the top. It's mine to make you angry doing it.

name: The Big One
description: Challenge your enemies by overcoming a simulation in perpetual construction. The Big One is an action/platform game of the "dungeon crawler" type, where your reflexes and concentration will be put to the test.

name: Generations
description: In this stone age survival game, you must use all your skills to survive in a harsh and unforgiving environment. From crafting tools and shelter, to hunting and gathering food, you will need to do whatever it takes to stay alive. With all these conditions to contend with, will you survive?

name: Move On
description: Move On is a Drama Visual Novel game where players can choose their own path. where we will play the role of the protagonist of the story In which the game presents the 5 emotional release of the human.

name: The Visitor
description: In 'The Visitor' you will play as an author named Rachel. Your goal is to complete your book chapter by chapter before the deadline that is coming up. The longer you sit and type, the more you will slip into a schizophrenia state of mind. Complete the chapters and return to a normal average life!

name: Psychosis
description: Fight against demons and your own mind to save yourself from a never-ending hell in this retro-style survival-horror game about mystery, psychology, and the coldness of killing. Banish demons with deadly weapons and reassemble the mysterious pieces of a family gone missing in Psychosis.

name: Death Road
description: Death Road is a solo Top Down Shooter game. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from a zombies and monsters infestation, using over-the-top weaponry in a world with awesomely stylized graphics. The road journey has never been so much fun!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - Hamburg Flyer SVT 877
description: The Hamburg Flyer, a train consisting of two cars – each having a driver's cab and passenger cabin – was ordered by the Deutsche Reichsbahn-Gesellschaft in 1932 from Waggon- und Maschinenbau AG Goerlitz (WUMAG). The train was delivered in 1932 and put into service in 1933.

name: Orbit
description: Orbit is a Multiplayer Platformer game. Customise your own character and battle other Players and/or AI controlled Bots across a variety of randomly generated planets. Gain the advantage by earning XP and looting each Planet before your opponents do!

name: Kiki
description:
Put your platforming prowess to the test as you navigate vibrant 3D obstacle courses in first-person perspective! Kiki is a fast-paced action experience that’s laser-focused on precision platforming skills. Run and jump while dodging treacherous traps, collecting stars and trophies, finding keys to unlock gates and more, all set to a pumping chiptune soundtrack!

There are 60 obstacle courses to master across multiple worlds, each presenting a unique challenge and gradually increasing in difficulty as you progress. Clear mission goals and race against the clock to unlock new stages, or replay cleared levels to improve your score! Do you have what it takes to become the true master of jumping?

name: Tumble
description: Third-person Open World Adventure Exploration Game, About a Little Boy In Search of His Elder Brother

name: Redrum
description: Redrum, a 1v1 arcade party-game! Fight until the last second to win the cure and regain your lost humanity!

name: Treasure Trap
description: Pudi is an adventure lover who goes after the gold in the treasure map he got from a traveler. He now faces a dungeon of various challenges, the Color Dungeon! Will he finally be able to reach the gold he seeks or will everything be left with pain?

name: Toast
description: "Toast" is a game where players must use problem-solving skills to escape a randomly generated maze while being chased by a deadly humanoid piece of toast. The game features challenging puzzles, randomly generated levels, and endless hours of excitement.

name: Steel
description: Build and expand your village, hone your combat skills, and explore a vast world filled with danger and opportunity.

name: Homeward
description: Homeward is a cozy and non-violent deckbuilding game that takes you on an epic journey through the ocean. You'll get to explore a vast and fantastic world peppered with various biomes and cultures from which you'll recruit new crewmates to help you take on a variety of exciting quests.

name: Bat N' Ball
description: Bat N' Ball VR: Challenge your batting skills against robotic pitchers and compete for the highest score in this fast-paced and realistic virtual reality baseball game.

name: In Space
description: In Space is a 2D top-down Arena Shooter where you are on an alien planet, and you have to survive to a horde of alien creatures that want your blood

name: Empire of the Ants
description: Embark on an epic journey into the infinitesimal in this photorealistic strategy game. Play as a fearless ant and guide your colony through the dangers of the forest.

name: Metabolis
description: In this surreal platformer, released in 1985 for the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum, you have been transformed into a bird, and must fight to save the human race from the invading Kremins by exploring an expansive world and collecting useful items.

name: RGB Simulator
description: It is the best and only simulator in the form of a game with colors. In the game you play with colors, either on time limit, or just for fun.

name: EXS2: EthnologySister2 - Structuralism of Kinship System
description: EXS2 is a role playing visual novel.

name: AQRA Tenses: Learn English
description: Are you having trouble with English tenses? This game is specially designed to improve your memory in a short time.

name: Sex Simulator: Hot Sauna
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy having fun at a SPA/Sauna with 3 gorgeous women.

name: Sex Simulator: The Cabin
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy in a luxurious cabin with 3 gorgeous women.

name: Brickscapes: Bricks Breaker
description: Relax your mind with Brick Breaker Game. Start the new adventure of a bricks game! it is simple to play and fun to keep challenging yourself with new bricks.

name: Distributor Simulator
description: Distributor simulator is open world, third person game. Here you have to buy goods al lowest possible price and sell and deliver it to shops for higher price. Price is changing so buy and sell carefully, otherwise you will bankrupt.

name: Mochiko-san Reunion!
description:
Mochiko-san Reunion! is an escape game by Na-ra and translated by Yamikaze.

A rundown mansion on the way to the mountains. A rumor has been circulating that a sobbing voice can be heard coming from there. Prompted by her classmates, Yui Kashima decides to go and find out what the voices are.

name: Chess
description: Use Chess on your Mac to play a match online, against your computer or even against yourself.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - Collector's Edition
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The setting for Link’s adventure has been expanded to include the skies above the vast lands of Hyrule.

The collector's edition includes the following:
- The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom (physical version)
- Artbook
- SteelBook case
- Steel Poster
- A set of four pin badges.

name: Six Now, Forever and Ever
description: A collection of interactive poems taken from the public domain writings of A. A. Milne.

name: Monster Girl 2
description: This is a fascinating, casual, spot-the-difference puzzle game that tests your visual perceptual skills. Character accessories and the backgrounds are obscured. To complete the mission, you need to spot 8 to 15 differences to clear each level.

name: Super Size Me: Burger Man
description: Super Size Me: Burger Man is a promotional game for the documentary Super Size Me. The game is a Pac-Man clone.

name: Sonic In VaporWave Island
description: Sonic just wondering around one day until he finds a portal to vaporwave island.

name: Unreal Anthology
description: Released on the 8th anniversary of the initial game of the Unreal series, this collection contained every title and expansion available for the PC to-date with the notable exception of Unreal Tournament 2003. Also included in the bundle was a soundtrack CD featuring a selection of 23 tracks from the bundled games.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many cats and wool as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Soul Knight: The Forest of Spirits
description: A lone knight is lost in an enigmatic cave, now he must rely on his unshakable soul to face unknown challenges and uncover secrets in this journey of cunning and bravery. Your mission is to find the way out facing the darkness, avoiding obstacles and finding solutions to the challenges.

name: Real Zombie War Simulator
description: Destroy all zombies with sniper or other gun in this zombie game.

name: NCL: USA Bowl
description: Become a champion of your own tournament in NCL: USA Bowl. Race your friends and experience the thrill of American football.

name: Gunpowder Punk
description:
Gunpowder Punk is a game in pixel art cyberpunk world. You play as unnamed hero who fights against hordes of psycho gangers and their bosses.
Game made by single person.

name: Idinaloq
description:
Extraterrestrial mechanized marauders have arrived in near-future Earth orbit, launching an attack on the planet which must be repelled. Four pilots are qualified to pilot Idinaloq, humanity's ultimate spacefaring weapon. Sayuri, EIRIA, Irene, and Formera...these capable yet troubled women, together with their operator Tomomi, are the last defense against annihilation.

Idinaloq is a short, historically acclaimed Windows arcade shoot-em-up, with a mix of classic '90s design and forward-looking mechanics. The game debuted at both Comiket events in 1999, sold there before becoming online freeware.

name: Tales of Terrabanthis
description: Single player Fantasy RPG that is a turn based game designed to have older games functions with modern graphics.

name: Testament
description:
As told by the ancient scroll Lyle found on his travels, a great five-headed Pentadragon once ruled the Diodoran continent with its legions of monsters. The heavens struck them down, sinking their land far into the earth...until now. With Pentadragon and Diodoran resurfacing to torment the world again, Lyle ventures out with gun and gear to rid this realm of evil and fulfill the gods' prophecy.

Testament is a top-down, multi-scrolling shoot-'em-up adventure with several complex levels to explore. You acquire new weapons, items, and bonuses along paths strewn with enemies and hazards to encounter. Each stage features multiple boss fights and an assortment of secrets, either threatening or aiding your quest. You have limited lives and continues to work with, so play carefully and methodically to survive your expedition. This game led to the founding of a studio called Glodia, and it later received a Game Boy spiritual sequel simply called Pentadragon.

name: Isle of Swaps
description: Grab your cards, it's time to swap! Battle your school pals in this roguelite deckbuilder where you'll trade for new cards when you win defeat them and rip open booster packs looking for rare cards. Conquer everyone's dungeon decks to become Critter Champion of the Playground!

name: Jelly Battle
description: In Jelly Battle you must outlast your opponents. Fighting on a grid, each turn you must select a new tile to jump to. If that tile is a special tile then you will perform whichever action tied to that tile. Call in airstrikes, shoot lasers and drop pianos. Make sure you're the last to survive!

name: Brick Breaker Lab
description: Save the laboratory from the Artificial Intelligence gone crazy. Break hazardous bricks and take back control of the lab in this breakout brick breaker game.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball
description: 8-bit port of Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball.

name: Ecco the Dolphin
description: 8-bit port of Ecco the Dolphin.

name: Golden Axe
description: The 8-bit port of Golden Axe.

name: Gain Ground
description: 8-bit port of Gain Ground.

name: 8-Bit Slasher 4-in-1 Horror Demakes
description: 4 free NES fan games on your PC without the hassle of messing with emulators.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine
description: 8-bit port of Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

name: Ecco: The Tides of Time
description: 8-bit port of Ecco: The Tides of Time.

name: Ristar
description: 8-bit port of Ristar on the Sega Game Gear with remixed levels and a few original stages.

name: Vampire Survivors: Chaos Update
description:
The free "Chaos Update" brings a new challenge stage inspired heavily by another video game franchise, along with two new relics and three achievements for Vampire Survivors players to collect. Plus, one particular relic will receive a power-up under the right conditions. The launch of this update coincides with release version 1.3.0.

The Chaos Update's new stage is titled "Bat Country" and features only the titular winged creatures for players to take out in droves. The Chaos Malachite was revealed as one of the relics, which is stated to have a special interaction with the skeletal Mortaccio upon attaining level 80.

The update's name and the new level are clear homages to the Sonic the Hedgehog series. In a gameplay trailer for the update, special stage elements inspired by 1991's Sonic the Hedgehog and 1994's Sonic the Hedgehog 3 were seen, with the Bat Country level's background referencing the latter's Blue Spheres stages. Even the Chaos Malachite relic is a tongue-in-cheek reference to the Chaos Emeralds from the Sonic series.

name: Deck Defenders
description: Deck Defenders is an online card game where players can battle it out to become the top-ranked player. Collect cards and build your own decks to customize your strategy. Your forces need your strategies and tactics in this competitive card battler where the superior player always comes out on top!

name: Cukies World
description: Cukies World is an immersive gaming experience with exciting features. There are three different ways to play to make every player happy: single player, cooperative mode and competitive mode. Try them all and decide which one fits you best!

name: Redout 2: Winter Pack
description: Race across the glacial plains and lava-stricken canyons of Mercury in the Redout 2 - Winter Pack, featuring 3 new tracks, 28 career events and new music tracks by Dance With The Dead!

name: Smashy Brick
description: Draw trampolines to break brick structures.

name: FNaF World Randomizer
description:
This is a mod for FNAF WORLD where enemy encounters, bosses, party members, attack moves, chip chests, and byte shops are all randomized.

You have the option of either playing Adventure Mode- beginning with a team of 8 and going through the game as you would- or Fixed Party, which is having every move and party member from the start.

name: Lontra-Metragem
description: In the city of Lontrina, the last rental company in the world is on the rise! Several cinephile animals from all over the country are eager to visit it. Among them, a very astute otter, who is not there to rent DVDs. Guide this little thief through this sprawling video store, slipping out of sight of the staff to complete her mission: borrow lots of DVDs… …without warning! And, of course, without getting caught, because you need to take these DVDs to your neighborhood otters!

name: CargoRun
description: Cargo Run is a fun platformer 3d Third Person game where you have to pass through different obstacles to get to your goal.

name: First Person Hooper
description: First Person Hooper is a skill based, arcade-style basketball game focused on the jump shot. Featuring first-person shooter controls with a lock-on system similar to modern FPS games, players can easily shoot the ball with power & timing mechanics relative to location on the court. Score with movement bonuses and get rewarded with power-ups for every swish and bank shot you make. Get shots up in a relaxed island setting and customize the court to fit your mood. Includes score, time-attack, and free play modes.

name: Minecraft: Egyptian Mythology Mash-up
description: Will you survive the perils of the Pyramids? Journey through the Valley of the Kings, dodge deadly traps, and explore the ancient tombs below! The fourth pack in the Mythology series, this Egyptian-themed Mash-up comes with textures fit for a Pharaoh, legendary mobs, a pantheon of skins, and an epic soundtrack!

name: Falling Blocks
description: Protect the ground against the falling blocks from the space to get higher score.

name: Defina
description: Defina Finance is a fascinating blockchain game that combines the concept of DeFi and NFT. Players are able to buy or collect various NFT Mystery Boxes to get champions/weapons as well as fight and enhance their champions to learn skills in numerous game scenarios. Players can participate in DeFi yield farming and earn abundant on-chain earnings while enjoying a fun and strategic card game with PVP and PVE modes. Defina’s vision is to bring blockchain to millions of players, allowing them to explore a new form of gaming through blockchain technology.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Clockwork City
description: Enter the mechanical world of the Clockwork City and explore Sotha Sil's greatest creation.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Markarth
description: The Dark Heart of Skyrim epic concludes in Markarth. As the Gray Host marches on the Reach, find unlikely allies among the clans that call this wild region home and unveil the true motivations of the mysterious Vampire Lord, Rada al-Saran.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Ascending Tide
description: The Legacy of the Bretons year-long story starts here! Strange things are happening in the Coral Aerie and Shipwright's Regret as old rivalries, ancient history, and the birthright of the Bretons come into focus and lead to the upcoming High Isle Chapter.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Lost Depths
description: Out at sea or in the heart of a druid grove, the Legacy of the Bretons year-long story sails on! An ancient enemy rises to threaten the peace of Earthen Root Enclave, and dark storms erupt from Graven Deep. The earth trembles before the next DLC!

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Firesong
description: Set sail for Galen as the Legacy of the Bretons year-long story comes to a close! A druid civil war erupts and followers of the True Way vie for the legacy of the Druid King. Unite with new allies to make the Systres safe once and for all.

name: Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure Adventure
description:
Christmas, 2001. You just unwrapped a brand new Nintendo Gamecube, the latest and greatest in video game hardware. All your friends will be so jealous.

Unfortunately, your parents did their holiday shopping late and Kohl's didn't have much left in terms of software selection. So you unwrap your one and only game, Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure, and read the back cover:

It's a VIP ticket to theme park adventure!

Lights... Camera... Play! You've not just a visitor, you're the star in Kemco's Universal Studios Theme Park Adventure, a magical 3-D journey beyond the theme park rides and into an amazing realm of games based upon the most successful movies produced in Hollywood.

You'll love this virtual gaming lark through the world's best movie theme park!
It'll be months before your parents buy you another game. Let's hope this one is good.

name: Among the Stars
description: Separated by an illegal fire, two indigenous sisters try to reunite with the help of an ancient nature entity.

name: Metal Knights
description: Metal Knights is The Strategy Game for all Internet gamers. Build, conquer and rule your empires online!

name: Pawapuro-kun Pocket 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Pawapuro-kun Pocket 7
description: Sin descripción

name: Tevi
description: A new game from the creators of Rabi-Ribi, embark on an epic action-adventure as you slash, dash, and combo your way through a sprawling land scarred by conflict. Explore and discover hidden secrets. Customize your build to triumph in spectacular boss fights and unravel the mysteries of the world in TEVI, a bullet hell metroidvania!

name: Ace Attorney Investigations 0: Quercus Alba Dating Simulator
description: Ten years before the events of Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth, the story follows Protagonist, a podiatry student at Allebahst Academy, as he falls in love on first sight with the impenetrable Ambassador Quercus Alba, and becomes involved in an incident that would forever scar the school.

name: Strain
description: A horror game that aims to escape from a Japanese house where vengeful spirits live.

name: Camphor
description: A short 'bitsy poem' about my feelings towards fireflies. Made in the span of around 2 hours on a whim on the 9th of February, 2023. Plays for 30 seconds to a minute. Inspired by a recent listen to 'The Campfire Headphase' by Boards of Canada. You play as a worm in a forest swerving through rocks and trees to see fireflies.

name: The Abyss
description: "Everlasting night. Shadowed crescent, red moon runs. Watch the sleeping sun." -The White Crown Traverse throughout Mondreich, Learn its secrets, and free yourself from the chains of power and madness.

name: Fabled Lands: Lords of the Rising Sun
description: The Lords of the Rising Sun rule the exotic kingdom of Akatsurai, but rival warrior clans constantly seek to overthrow them. Will you spy for the Shogun? Make your fortune as a paid assassin? Or become one of the Sovereign's knights in your pursuit of glory and power?

name: Cursor Story
description: Play as a cursor going on an adventure to retrieve it's lost memories. Play through small bullet-hell-ish levels and meet cool, interesting, weird and funny characters.

name: Arcade Archives: Magical Speed
description: Ready, set, go!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hashiwokakero
description: Draw as many connecting lines as indicated by the numbers in the circles.

name: Red Bird Adventure: Classic Physics Puzzle
description: A popular puzzle game based on real physics. Find a way to save the birds!

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe
description: This is the biggest trip in Europe, where you will visit 10 countries and 24 cities.

name: Passage: A Job Interview Simulator!
description: An intense visual novel adventure based on real-life experiences! Choices that matter, multiple endings, 3+ hours of gameplay, OST, real-life career advice based on comprehensive research!

name: The Faceless
description: You have been thrown into an unknown territory, your task is to find and clear all enemies. As you progress through the game, you explore the abandoned buildings and industrial areas. Third Person Shooter. Explore the area and its buildings, collect ammo, protection and medical kits.

name: Pretty Girls Breakers! Plus
description: Brick-busting action returns with outfits to unlock for an even larger cast of beautiful companions!

name: Piczle Lines 2: Into the Puzzleverse
description: Piczle Lines, the most addictive logic-puzzle known to Man, is back in this all new story-driven, extras-filled, puzzleverse-exploring extravaganza!

name: Animal Puzzle World
description: Puzzles with awesome animals!

name: Sniper Strike 3D
description: Are you ready to immerse yourself in a fast-paced first-person shooter? Sniper Strike 3D is an amazing story game where you have to fight against a lot of villains, save innocent people and bring justice.

name: Myst Mobile
description:
Journey to Myst Island and begin to unravel the mystery you have been thrust into. As you learn what happened on the island, you will find yourself playing a key role in an epic story whose ending has not yet been written.

The island is full of secrets – learn your surroundings and discover what you can interact with. Each puzzle you solve will bring you closer to exploring more of the island, and reveal methods to reach other stunning and surreal worlds called “Ages”.

With an in-app purchase to unlock the other Ages of Myst, you will see even greater challenges await you, and discover deeper connections and puzzles that Myst has to offer. Uncover a story of ruthless family betrayal, and make choices that will affect both you, and the world of Myst itself.

name: Fish Heroes
description: Meet Mr. Puffer, Mr. Whale, the quirky Octopus and other Fish Heroes who have set sail to save the smaller fish from being canned by the Shark Mafia! This 3D physics action-puzzler will test your skills, aim and logic in a mesmerizing ocean environment.

name: Escape Mystery-The Dark Fence
description:
Escape from the Darkness, Be careful of the scary black shadows. Then find the ghost-lighted Pumpkins. You are ready to inventory secrets in the Panic Room and find the Hidden objects get out of the room escape.
All the 30 levels you feel different astonishment thrilling adventures in feel panic room compare to another play escape!

name: Forza Street: Tap to Race
description: Race through the ultimate street racing scene at dizzying speed with the tap of your finger! Have fun winning the racing car collection of your dreams. Pick an event, choose a lineup of cars from your collection, and start racing for infamy in the first Forza game for mobile.

name: Fox Runner Adventures
description:
Monsters appeared in the mysterious forest, which captured the crystals and prevent the inhabitants of the forest from living in peace.
You have to take on the task of cleaning the forest and preserve the crystals. This will help you to different characters with unique abilities.
Do not forget to improve the abilities of the characters, and you will win!
Good luck, the forest is on your side!

name: Rally Run
description: Rally Run is a fast-paced, single-touch racing game you can play on the go, with engaging racing, nitro-boosting and drifting mechanics - you won't have raced like this before!

name: World Boxing Challenge
description: World Boxing Challenge puts pure iron in your hands, with the ultimate 3D, multi-device boxing experience. Train your boxers, grow your gym, and earn glory and money.

name: Guroku Rainbow
description:
Guroku Rainbow is the successor to the popular Guroku game, which is expanded with new types of stones, bringing even more gameplay possibilities and even more interesting puzzles to solve.
The player moves colored stones around the game grid, which determines the directions in which a stone can move at a given position. His goal is to get the individual stones to the target square of the same color. Each time the player moves a stone in a chosen direction, that stone does not stop moving until it hits another stone or arrives at a position on the game grid from which it is no longer allowed to move in that direction. This principle forces players to devise clever solutions, such as strategically placing other stones in such places that the moving stone stops where it is needed.
This unique game mechanic, which won the original Guroku so many fans around the world with its originality, is expanded in the new Guroku Rainbow with two new types of stones.
